GSP33bbdip11u:25: jñeyaṃ gamyaṃ gurūṃścāpi natvā sūtrārtha ucyate //
GSP33bbdip11u:34: teṣāṃ cārthanirṇayāya brahmasūtrāṇi cakāra bhagavān bādarāyaṇaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:36_2: maṅgalamācaran śiṣyaśikṣārthaṃ grathayati cikīrṣitaṃ ca pratijānīte - 'nārāyaṇam'; iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:46: tathā ca gurūṃśca natvā sāṣṭāṅgaṃ namaskṛtya 'sūtrārthaḥ';
GSP33bbdip11u:52: gamyam ityanena caturthādhyāyasya arthaḥ śiṣyahitatayā ādau saṅgṛhīta iti jñātavyam /
GSP33bbdip11u:54: kintu arāḥ doṣāḥ tadviruddhāḥ nārāḥ guṇāḥ teṣāmāśraya iti vā,
GSP33bbdip11u:57: aravidhuramuktāśraya iti vā yogenotkṛṣṭaguṇavācaka ityuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33bbdip11u:58: tena nārāyaṇa eva śāstrārtha iti pradarśitam /
GSP33bbdip11u:62: tathā ca 'nārāyaṇaṃ natvā guṇairudīrṇaṃ natvā doṣavarjitaṃ natvā';
GSP33bbdip11u:66: na ca 'gurūn nārāyaṇaśabdavācyān nārāyaṇapadenaiva gurunāma covāca,
GSP33bbdip11u:83: anenaiva ślokena śrotṛpravṛttyaṅgabhūtāḥ śāstrādhikāriviṣayaprayojanasambandhāśca śiṣyaśikṣārthaṃ sūcitā bhavanti/ @#----------
GSP33bbdip11u:86: dvāpare sarvatra jñāne ākulībhūte tannirṇayāya brahmarudrendrādibhirarthito bhagavānnārāyaṇo vyāsatvenāvatatāra /
GSP33bbdip11u:91: prāmāṇyameva kathamityāśaṅkya āptimūlatvādinaiveti parihāramabhipretya vaktṛśrotṛprasaṅgadoṣābhāvarūpāptimūlatvopapādanāya sūtrāgatikramamāha - 'dvāpare'; ityādinā /
GSP33bbdip11u:93: dvābhyāṃ yugābhyāṃ parasminnuttarasmin yuge iti vā,
GSP33bbdip11u:94: vaivasvatamanvantare mahāyugeṣu prathamadvāparāpekṣayāṣṭāviṃśe dharmapādadvayayutatvāt dvāparākhye yuge /
GSP33bbdip11u:99: samyagjñānaṃ saguṇatvādijñānaṃ uta nirguṇatvādijñānamiti vipratipattijanyasandehaviṣayatāṃ nirguṇatvādijñānameva na tvanyaditi mithyājñānaviṣayatāṃ ca prāpte sati,
GSP33bbdip11u:100: tajjñānaviṣayībhūtaṃ saguṇatvādikaṃ tattvamanyadveti sandehe tādṛgviparyaye ca satīti yāvat /
GSP33bbdip11u:103: idameva tattvaṃ nānyaditi viṣaye samyaktvaniścayārthamiti yāvat /
GSP33bbdip11u:107: anyapadārthānāṃ devānāṃ brahmarudrendrādibhiriti yadviśeṣaṇaṃ tat prasiddhaprabhāvānāmapi bhagavaditareṣāmaśakyamidaṃ kāryamiti pradarśanārtham /
GSP33bbdip11u:114: tannirṇayāyendrādibhirarthito rudraḥ brahmā ca tataḥ taiḥ sarvairupagamyottamādhikāribhiḥ arthito bhagavāniti buddhyā vivekenānvayaḥ / @#----------
GSP33bbdip11u:117: atheṣṭāniṣṭaprāptiparihārecchūnāṃ tadyogamavijānatāṃ tajjñāpanārthaṃ vedamutsannaṃ vyañjayaṃścaturdhā vyabhajat,
GSP33bbdip11u:120: tataḥ kiṃ prakṛte ityata āha - atheti /
GSP33bbdip11u:139_0: tathā ca avāntaravedavibhāgāt prāgeva tataḥ svata eva caturdhā vibhaktāt ṛgādirūpāt
GSP33bbdip11u:139_1: mūlavedāt caturdhā vibhaktaṃ vedaṃ ṛṅnigadādirūpamupavedaṃ vyañjayan adhyāpanenābhivyajya
GSP33bbdip11u:145: adhyetṛṇāmalpaśaktiṃ vīkṣya caturviṃśatidhā ekaśatadhā ekottaraśatākhyaprakāreṇa sahasradhā dvādaśadhā ca vyabhajadityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:147: ṛcaḥ sa ṛca uddhṛtya ṛgvedaṃ kṛtavān prabhuḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:149: ityādinā svata eva caturdhā vibhaktāt mūlavedāt ṛgādirūpopavedamuddhṛtyābhivyajya tasmādavāntaram ṛgvedādi kṛtavānityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:150: atra pūrvaṃ dvāparagrahaṇaṃ mahāvedāt uddhṛtasya upavedasya avāntaravedatvena avāntaravedasya ca caturviṃśatyāditvena vibhāgakathanaṃ ca akhilajñānākulībhāvasamarthanārtham /
GSP33bbdip11u:156: eko vedaḥ kṛte hyāsīt tretāyāṃ sa tridhābhavat /
GSP33bbdip11u:157: sa eva pañcadhā jāto dvāparaṃ prāpya vai yugam //
GSP33bbdip11u:158: utsannassa kaliṃ prāpya vedaḥ prāyeṇa sarvaśaḥ //
GSP33bbdip11u:159: ityatharvaṇabhāṣyodāhṛtasmṛtau kṛtayuge vedaikatvasya tretāyāṃ traividhyamātrasya dvāpare pañcavidhatvasya cokteḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:162: ityanena tretāyuge caturdhā vibhāgasya dvāpara evotsādasya coktervirodho bhāti /
GSP33bbdip11u:164: tretāyuge prācuryeṇa bhagavadijyāsādhanatvavivakṣayā traividhyoktāvapi vastuta atharvaṇākhyaprakārāntarasattvasya aniṣedhena vidhāntarasyāpi sattvasambhavāt,
GSP33bbdip11u:165: dvāpare apauruṣeyasya vedasya caturvidhatve 'pi pauruṣeyairitihāsapurāṇādibhiḥ saha pañcavidhatvasyāpi sambhavāt,
GSP33bbdip11u:166: bāhulyena sarvaiḥ prakārairvedasya kalāvutsāde 'pi vyāsāvatārātpūrvaṃ dvāpare 'pyapapāṭhādirūpotsādasya sambhavāt avirodhaḥ/ @#----------
GSP33bbdip11u:179: brahmādīnāmarthitvoktyā ca śrotṛdoṣābhāvasya vaktari tannimittavipralambhābhāvasya coktatvāt,
GSP33bbdip11u:181: ityanena ajñānanirharaṇasya prasaktatvena prasaṅgadoṣābhāvasya tata evānapahāsasya coktatvādāptimūlatā darśitā bhavati/
GSP33bbdip11u:185: tathā ca siddhaṃ brahmasūtrāṇāṃ prāmāṇyamiti bhāvaḥ / @#----------
GSP33bbdip11u:196: na kevalamasmābhiḥ kintu skānde coktamiti samuccaye vā 'ca'; śabdaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:199: tathāpi skānde coktamiti prauḍhavādaṃ karoti'; iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:204: yadvā - utpattyādyaṣṭake jñānasya praviṣṭatvāt tasya nārāyaṇajanyatvopapattiḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:214: idamado veti pūrvoktasaṃśayaviṣayatām anyadeveti mithyājñānaviṣayatāṃ ca prāptamityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:216: dvāpare yuge akhilaṃ sarvaviṣayaṃ tadanyathā jātamityanvayaḥ / @#----------
GSP33bbdip11u:223: nanu kālaprayuktamanyathātvaṃ cet dvāparayuge bhāgadvayasyaivānyathātvaṃ yuktaṃ,
GSP33bbdip11u:224: na tu sarvasyetyato viśeṣakāraṇaṃ cāha - 'gotamasya'; iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:225: 'tu'; śabdaścārthaḥ śāpe viśeṣakāraṇatvasya jñāne vā samyaktvasya dyotakaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:226: tathā ca gautamasya ṛṣeḥ śāpācca jñāne guṇapūrṇatvādisamyagjñāne ajñānatāṃ nedaṃ tattvajñānamiti tattvajñānabhinnatvaprakārakapratītiviṣayatāṃ sandehaviṣayatāṃ ca gate prāpte sati,
GSP33bbdip11u:231: ajñānādimiśrajñāninaḥ yadviṣaye jñānaṃ jātaṃ punastadviṣayagataprakāreṣu ajñānasaṃśayādimantaḥ santaḥ 'śaraṇyaṃ';
GSP33bbdip11u:237: taṃ prārthayan svakāryaṃ ca vyajñāpayanniti ca draṣṭavyam /
GSP33bbdip11u:238: atra brahmādibuddhīnāṃ saṅkīrṇatvaṃ nāma saṅkīrṇabuddhiṣu sajjaneṣu dayāyuktatvameva,
GSP33bbdip11u:242: brahmādidevagonirmātṛvyatiriktalokasya tu gautamahatagonirmātṛtvābhāve 'pi sampradāyapravartakābhāvāt kālataścājñānaprāptiriti draṣṭavyam /
GSP33bbdip11u:243: gautamaśāpāgamaprakārastu ittham - pūrvaṃ hi dvādaśavārṣikyāṃ anāvṛṣṭau satyāṃ tayā pīḍitā ṛṣayo gautamāśramaṃ annavantam adhyūṣuḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:245: atha anāvṛṣṭau śāntāyāṃ teṣāṃ svasvāśramagamanecchā samajani /
GSP33bbdip11u:249: haraśirassthasurasaritaṃ sapatnīṃ matvā tāṃ niścikāsayiṣantyā pārvatyā preṣito vināyako brahmacāriveṣeṇa pracchannastānṛṣīnupasasāra,
GSP33bbdip11u:255: yūyaṃ jñānatapobalāt kāñcana māyāmayīṃ māheyīṃ nirmimīdhvam /
GSP33bbdip11u:257: atha sasyagrāsinīṃ tāṃ apakrāmayituṃ prayatiṣyate gautamaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:259: tadā brāhmaṇāstaṃ pratibrūta yāvadimāmaśeṣamātaraṃ gāṃ notthāpayiṣyati bhavān tāvanna bhojyānnaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:260: tato haraśirassthadyusaritamavatārya tadvāriṇā abhiṣicya tāmujjīvayatu bhavān ityevamanutāpinaṃ tamabhilapyāpasaratetyuktvā herambo 'mbikāṃ jagāma/
GSP33bbdip11u:261: atha te vināyakena praṇigaditaṃ prayāṇopāyamupasṛtya anvatiṣṭhan/
GSP33bbdip11u:263: tatastāvadgautamaḥ tapasā tryambakamārādhya mandākinīṃ anusamānīya tadvāriṇā surabhimabhiṣiṣeca /
GSP33bbdip11u:265: ata eva godāvarīti tasyāḥ saṃjñā samajani /
GSP33bbdip11u:267: aśapacca gautamaḥ yadasmadannanimittajñānabalādete gāṃ niramaṃsta tat jñānamapaitviti / @#----------
GSP33bbdip11u:274: śatadhā caikadhā caiva tathaiva ca sahasradhā /
GSP33bbdip11u:277: devaiḥ prārthito bhagavān kimakarodityata āha - 'taiḥ'; iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:284: san vijñāpitaṃ pratipāditam avatārādirūpaṃ kāryaṃ yasya saḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:296: tāṃśca prāgeva caturdhā vibhaktān vedān punaḥ 'caturdhā vyabhajat';
GSP33bbdip11u:319: vedānāṃ bahutve 'pi arthasyaikatvāttadvivakṣayā tān vedāniti bahuvacananirdiṣṭānāmapi vedānāṃ tasyetyekavacanena nirdeśo nānupapannaḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:325: ityatra punaḥ nidrāpagamānantaramiti sudhoktyā 'tṛtīye punareva ca';
GSP33bbdip11u:329: nanu sūtrāntaraireva vedārthanirṇayasambhavātkiṃ brahmasūtrairiti gatārthatāśaṅkāparihārāyāha - 'yeṣām'; iti/
GSP33bbdip11u:340: kiṃ tat sūtratvaṃ yadāñjasyaṃ brahmasūtrāṇāmityata āha - 'alpa'; iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:341: yāvadakṣaratāṃ vinā śrutyarthābhyāṃ vivakṣitārthasiddhirnāsti tadarthapratipādanāya tāvanmātrākṣaramasati niyāmake tato 'dhikākṣararahitam 'alpākṣaram'; /
GSP33bbdip11u:349: tattvapradīpe tu ekaṃ prayojanaṃ pratyapekṣitārthasya kṛtsnasya pratipādikaṃ 'viśvatomukham'; ityuktam /
GSP33bbdip11u:357: ṛgakṣarāvyāptagānabhāgaparipūrakasāmagatastobhākṣarāṇi apaśabdopetatādṛśavākyaṃ ca vyāvartayituṃ krameṇa viśeṣaṇānīti padaprayojanaṃ tattvapradīpoktamanusandheyam /
GSP33bbdip11u:358: atra sarvatra dharmikathane 'pi taddvārā sūtrapadapravṛttinimittamapyuktamiti nāsaṅgatiḥ / @#----------
GSP33bbdip11u:369: tathā ca yato brahmasūtrāṇāṃ mukhyasūtratvamasti ata eva hi 'nirviśeṣitasūtratvaṃ';
GSP33bbdip11u:370: nirgatā viśeṣā yasmāttannirviśeṣaṃ tathākhyātaṃ nirviśeṣitaṃ tādṛśaṃ sūtrapadaṃ yasya tasya bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:372: tasyābhāvo 'sya sañjātaḥ tādṛśaḥ sūtraśabdo yasya tasya bhāvo nirviśeṣitasūtratvam /
GSP33bbdip11u:380: anena brahmasūtrāṇāṃ mukhyasūtratve nirviśeṣitaśabdavācyatvāditi heturukto bhavati /
GSP33bbdip11u:381: atra hetoraprayojakatvamāśaṅkya vyāptivacanena tāṃ parihartuṃ tatra prathamaṃ yadyannanirviśeṣitaṃ tattanna mukhyamityanvayavyāptimabhipretya tatra dṛṣṭāntamāha - 'yathā'; iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:384: tathā ca yathā ekasyaiva sataḥ kṛṣṇasya vedavyāsasya vyāsatvaṃ nirviśeṣitavyāsapadavācyatvamastītyarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:386: idānīṃ ye amukhyāḥ na te nirviśeṣapadavācyāḥ kintu saviśeṣapadavācyāḥ iti vyatirekavyāptimabhipretya tatra dṛṣṭāntamāha - 'anye'; iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:403: tatra nirviśeṣitatvahetoḥ samavyāptipareṇa tadarthameva prāguktavyatirekavyāptidṛṣṭāntavacanenopapāditānvayavyāptikamanumānaṃ niyāmakatvenāha - 'saviśeṣaṇa'; iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:446: tathā ca mukhyāmukhyayornirviśeṣaṇasaviśeṣaṇaśabdavācyatve vedo vṛddhavyavahāraśca pramāṇamityuktatvānna tayoḥ kāraṇāntaraṃ śaṅkyamiti bhāvaḥ / @#----------
GSP33bbdip11u:452: tathāpi vedārthanirṇayasya sūtrāntaraireva sambhavāt kiṃ brahmasūtrairiti codyasya kathaṃ 'yeṣām';
GSP33bbdip11u:453: ityanena parihāra ukta ityatastadvākyoktaṃ vivṛṇoti - 'sūtreṣu'; iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:456: nirṇayasya sarvatvaṃ viṣayadvārā tasya ca śabdadvārā bodhyam /
GSP33bbdip11u:457: tathā ca yebhyaḥ sūtrebhyaḥ sarve nirṇayāḥ sarvaśākhārthanirṇayāḥ bhāvyatayā samudīritāḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:463: sati caivaṃ tadantargataṃ sūtradharmatayoktaṃ viśvatoṇukhatvamapi teṣāmevāñjasā bhavati /
GSP33bbdip11u:466: yata evamataḥ sarvavedaśākhārthanirṇāyakānāṃ brahmasūtrāṇām asarvanirṇāyakebhyo 'nyasūtrebhyo 'tiśayena nirṇāyakatvāt yuktaṃ 'tasyārthavittaye brahmasūtrāṇi cakāra'; iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:467: tacchabdaghaṭitaṃ tadvacanaṃ tādarthyena sūtrakaraṇavacanamiti bhavati tena śaṅkāparihāra iti / @#----------
GSP33bbdip11u:474: tathā ca aṃśe gatārthatetyāśaṅkāparihārāyāñjasyoktyā sūcitamanyaccāha - 'śabdajātasya'; iti/
GSP33bbdip11u:476: ata evoktaṃ sudhāyām “etanmīmāṃsopajīvinī khalu seti purāṇe paṭhyate śabdajātasyeti“iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:490: yathā śrutimūlakasmṛteravaiyarthyaṃ tadvadavaiyarthyopapattermūlena mūlino vaiyarthyābhāvāditi bhāvaḥ / @#----------
GSP33bbdip11u:512: ityuktāḥ pañcavidhā api muktiyogyāḥ saṅgṛhītā bhavanti /
GSP33bbdip11u:516: jñānaṃ saṃsthāpya bhagavān krīḍate puruṣottamaḥ / ityādi /
GSP33bbdip11u:521: tathā ca puruṣottamo mahāyaśāḥ uttamaśloko bhagavān vyāso yeṣu sūtreṣu sarve nirṇayāḥ samudīritāḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:523_2: tadupajīvī - taṃ vinā avāntaratātparyajñānamātreṇa muktiphalāsiddheriti coktaṃ 'yeṣāṃ';
GSP33bbdip11u:524: iti pūrvavākye pramāṇe ca - evaṃvidhāni etādṛkprakārāṇi sūtrāṇi kṛtvā brahmarudrādideveṣu manuṣyapitṛpakṣiṣu jñānaṃ saṃsthāpya krīḍata iti mahāvākyayojanā /
GSP33bbdip11u:526: iti pāṭhe aiśvaryam evaṃvidhasūtrakaraṇe asāmarthyaśaṅkānirāsakatayoktamiti dhyeyam /
GSP33bbdip11u:527: atra brahmādiṣu jñānasaṃsthāpanaṃ nāma pūrvaṃ sthitasyaiva jñānasya viśeṣayuktyādibhiḥ dṛḍhīkaraṇaṃ kiñcidaprāptalābhaścocyate1,
GSP33bbdip11u:530: na ca 'evaṃ jñānaṃ punaḥ prāpurdevāśca ṛṣayastathā';
GSP33bbdip11u:545_0: tathā ca viṣayābhāvāt pratyagrūpe brahmaṇyahamiti pratīyamāne 'pi mokṣānuphalambhena
GSP33bbdip11u:545_1: prayojanābhāvāt tata eva tatpratibaddhādhikāryabhāvācca na brahmajijñāsā kartavyeti
GSP33bbdip11u:551: yathātraiva jijñāsādhikaraṇe “tadvijijñāsasva“iti jijñāsābhidhāyakavākyavihitā śravaṇādirūpā jijñāsā viṣayaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:569: sāpi ākṣepikī ātideśikī aupodghātikī āpavādikī prāsaṅgikī ityādirūpeṇa bahuvidhā /
GSP33bbdip11u:576: atra sūtre ādyantayoroṅkāraḥ uccāraṇīyaḥ tatrādya eka eva dṛṣṭādṛṣṭobhayārthaḥ ata eva sūtrāvayavaḥ sarvasūtreṣu anuvṛttyarthamasaṃhitatayoccāryate /
GSP33bbdip11u:578: ante tu pakṣadvaye 'pi adṛṣṭārtha eka evoṅkāraḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:597: oṃ brahmaśabdayorubhayoryaugikatve 'pi ekasya rūḍhatvena viśeṣyavācitvaṃ anyasya yaugikatvena viśeṣaṇavācitvamāśrityānvayāṅgīkārānnānyataravaiyarthyam /
GSP33bbdip11u:605: granthādau maṅgalācaraṇasyāvaśyaṃ kartavyatvena maṅgalaprayojakatayā athaśabdaṃ vyācaṣṭe - 'atha'; iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:607: tathā praśastarūpānuṣṭheyamaṅgalātmako viṣṇuḥ tadguṇo vābhidheyo yasya sa tathoktaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:612: muktyarthimātrasya brahmajijñāsāyāṃ pravṛttinirasanatātparyeṇāpi prayuktasyākhaṇḍāthaśabdasya vācyamarthamāha - 'adhikāra'; iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:614: na kevalaṃ maṅgalaprayojakaḥ kintvānantaryābhidhāyakaśceti viṣayasamuccaye vā /
GSP33bbdip11u:630_0: nanvathātaḥ śabdapūrvakatvaṃ sūtrāṇāṃ kiṃ nimittaṃ vighnanivartakaśabdoccāraṇādeḥ
GSP33bbdip11u:630_1: “maṅgalaṃ tataḥ“iti śabdāntaroccāraṇenāpi sambhavādityāśaṅkāṃ purāṇavacanenaiva nirākaroti - 'uktañca'; iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:633: kintu gāruḍe ceti samuccaye vā ca śabdaḥ / @#----------
GSP33bbdip11u:660: nanvavaśyavaktavyārthatvaṃ svarūpottamattvam arthata ādhikyaṃ vā niyāmakaṃ bhaviṣyatītyāśaṅkyādyapakṣe pṛcchati - 'kaśca'; iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:672: tathā ca - tayorathātaḥśabdayoḥ arthataḥ uttamatā ādhikyaṃ
GSP33bbdip11u:674: atra ādyatṛtīyapakṣayoravaśyavaktavyārthatārthādhikyayostadabhāvayośca loke śabdāntareṣu darśanāt athātaśśabdayostatsandehāt praśna eva na tvākṣepaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:675: dvitīyapakṣe tu svarūpādhikyasya śabdāntareṣvadarśanāt ākṣepa eveti dhyeyam /
GSP33bbdip11u:681: etadākhyāhi me brahman yathā jñāsyāmi tattvataḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:704: avaśyakartavyaprayojanakatvācca prathamamathaśabdaprayoga iti bhāvenāthaśabdo maṅgalārtha iti svoktārthe pramāṇaṃ darśayati - 'maṅgalārthe'; iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:707: tathā ca - maṅgalarūpaprayojanārthaṃ ca athaśabdaḥ sūtrakāraissamudīritaḥ prayukto bhavedityarthaḥ/
GSP33bbdip11u:717: evamathaśabdasya avasyavaktavyārthatvarūpaṃ prathamaprayoganiyāmakaṃ pradarśya ataḥśabdasyāpi taddarśayati - 'ataḥśabdastu hetvarthe'; iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:719: heturliṅgaṃ kāraṇaṃ ca sa cāsāvartho 'bhidheyaśca tasmin tadviṣaye tadvācakatayā sūtrakṛdbhiḥ 'samudīritaḥ'; ityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:720: gurvarthadīpikāyāntu “hetvarthe iti svavākye pramāṇe ca 'taddhetutvaṃ vadan';
GSP33bbdip11u:724: hetāvityanuktvā arthaśabdagrahaṇaṃ śabdādhikyādarthādhikyamiti nyāyena prakṛterheturarthaḥ pratyayasya tu hetutvamartha iti prakṛtipratyayobhayārthakathanārtham /
GSP33bbdip11u:725: yadvā - arthaśabdasyobhayatra śravaṇātsa pūrvatrāpyanuṣañjanīya iti jñāpanāya,
GSP33bbdip11u:729: parasya brahmaṇo viṣṇoḥ prasādāditi vā bhavet /
GSP33bbdip11u:750: kintu kartavyajijñāsāyāṃ jñānamokṣayorathaśabdārthādhyayanādau ca kāraṇatvenānvaya ityāśayena pṛthaguktiḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:758: nanu jijñāsādyarthaṃ kiṃ bhagavatprasādena yenāsāvavaśyavaktavyārthaḥ syādityata āha - 'sa hi'; iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:761: sarveṣāṃ adhikāriṇāṃ sarvasmin pūrṇe viṣṇau manovṛtteḥ prerakaḥ prāvaṇyahetuḥ 'samudāhṛtaḥ';
GSP33bbdip11u:765: evaṃ sarvāsāṃ manovṛttīnāṃ tatprabhedānāṃ ṭīkāsthādipadagṛhītānāṃ jñānādhyayanādīnāṃ manovṛttisādhyamokṣādeśca prerakaḥ sampādakaḥ ityapi vyākhyeyam /
GSP33bbdip11u:773_1: kṛtacodyasya kaḥ parihāra ityato na kevalamavaśyavaktavyārthatvādathātaḥśabdayoḥ prathamaprayogaḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:784: svasamānajātīyaśabdāntarotpatteḥ pūrvaṃ oṅkāro 'tha śabdaścetyetau kaṇṭhaṃ bhittvā 'vinissṛtau';
GSP33bbdip11u:791: nanu dvayorekavidhaṃ prāthamikatvaṃ viruddhamityata uktaṃ 'kramāt'; iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:799: athaśabdasya oṅkāreṇa saha svarūpādhikayamabhidhāya ataḥśabdasyāpi tadāha - 'tat'; iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:803: sa coddeśyasamarpakasya ata ityasya śabdaparatvajñāpanadvārā tṛtīyatayoktatvādividhānārthaḥ anyathā svarūpādhikyakathanadaśāsaṅgatiḥ syāt /
GSP33bbdip11u:806: tathāpi hetuśabdasya liṅgārthatvapakṣe tatsvarūpaṃ vivarituṃ kāraṇārthatvapakṣe tatkāryaṃ tasipratyayārthaṃ ca pradarśayituṃ 'taddhetutvaṃ vadan'; ityuktam /
GSP33bbdip11u:821: tasya prasannasyākāravācyasya viṣṇostatra jijñāsādau kāraṇatvaṃ tasipratyayena vadanprakṛtyaiva tasya jijñāsādermokṣahetutvarūpaṃ liṅgaṃ vā vadan 'ataḥ';
GSP33bbdip11u:825: yata evamato 'taśśabdo 'pi tṛtīyatayā prāthamika udāhṛta iti yojanā /
GSP33bbdip11u:826: tathā ca - maṅgalaśabdena maṅgaloktāvapi tasya svarūpādhikyānukteḥ athātaḥśabdābhyāmivādhikāraprayojanayoranukteśca na tena gatārthatā,
GSP33bbdip11u:828: ata eva ṭīkāyāṃ “maṅgaloktyādeḥ“ityādiśabdaḥ tataśśabdena hetvānantaryapratiyogyadhikārasūcane 'pi na tasyādisūtre niveśā yuktaḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:834: na kevalamavaśyavaktavyārthatvāt nāpi svarūpādhikyāt athātaśśabdayoḥ prathamaprayogaḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:836: ato 'pi prathamaprayoga iti bhāvena kathamiti tṛtīyapraśnasya prākarāntareṇottaramāha - 'akāraḥ'; iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:861: tathā ca - tasya akāravācyasya parabrahmaṇo vyāptisthityabhidāyakau ityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:865: thakārasya tu avikāreṇa avasthitirartha ityarthabhedo jñātavyaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:867: iti pāṭhabhedamaṅgīkṛtya prāṇātmakaṃ prāṇapraṇetāraṃ viṣṇuṃ vācakatvena prāptāviti vyākhyātam /
GSP33bbdip11u:868: yadyapi sūtre praviṣṭasya sarvanāmaprakṛtikasya ataśśabdasya naivamavayavārthakathanaṃ yujyate,
GSP33bbdip11u:871: tathāpi athaśabdasya arthata ādhikyānukteḥ tadgatavarṇayoḥ asarvanāmaprakṛtikātaśśabdagatavarṇayośca vākyārthāpraviṣṭātiśayitārthāntaroktiriyamityadoṣaḥ / @#----------
GSP33bbdip11u:874: ataśca pūrvamuccāryāḥ sarva ete satāṃ matāḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:928: caśabdo na kevalamadhikāraḥ kintu tadvibhāgaśca bhāgavatatantrākhyagranthe 'bhihita iti samuccaye /
GSP33bbdip11u:929: atra pramāṇe adhikārikathane 'pi tadviśeṣaṇatayā devatvādirūpo 'pyadhikāraḥ ukto bhavatīti nāsaṅgatiḥ/ @#----------
GSP33bbdip11u:940: tatra mandā manuṣyeṣu ya uttamagaṇā matāḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:942: 'tatra'; trividheṣu madhye manuṣyeṣu ye uttamagaṇāḥ te mokṣayogyeṣu mandādhikāriṇa ityuddeśyavidheyabhāvo draṣṭavyaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:979: asya ca mokṣayogyatvasya svarūpatvenānadhikāraḥ daśāyāmapi sattvādvyāpterdhrauvyādityataḥ prakārāntareṇa adhikāriṇaḥ svarūpamāha - 'tathā'; iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:994: atra - avaiṣṇavasya vede 'pi hyadhikāro na vidyate /
GSP33bbdip11u:1002: tathā ca - yo naraḥ parame viṣṇau bhaktimān adhyayanavāṃśca so 'dhamo 'dhikārīti prāmāṇikaiḥ samudāhṛtaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:1003: yaḥ śamādisaṃyukto naraḥ sa madhyama iti proktaḥ // @#----------
GSP33bbdip11u:1013: parabrahma tu sarvasāraṃ sarvathā nityaṃ ceti / @#----------
GSP33bbdip11u:1022: viṣṇupāda eva eko mukhyaḥ saṃśrayo mama śaraṇamiti jñānaṃ yasya saḥ / @#----------
GSP33bbdip11u:1028: sannyastaṃ bhagavati samarpitaṃ akhilaṃ yadakāmyaṃ karma tadvān 'saḥ';
GSP33bbdip11u:1031: atra sannyāso nāma bhagavān sarvāṇi karmāṇi karoti sarvakarmāṇi bhagavatpūjārūpāṇīti ca jñātvā bhrāntyā jīvakartṛkatvena jñātānāṃ karmaṇāṃ bhagavati visargaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:1036: na ca militānāṃ trayāṇāṃ pratyekaṃ triṣvabhāvādasambhavaḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:1038: uttaravākye pūrvasya pūrvavākye cottarasyānukarṣeṇa sarvatra sarvasya satvābhyupagamenāsambhavābhāvāt /
GSP33bbdip11u:1042: ta evottaratra saṅgṛhītāḥ pūrvatrānukṛṣṭāśca guṇā uttaroktāsteṣāṃ tatratatra bhaktimānityādiyathāsthitamūloktaguṇāpekṣayāprācuryeṇeti pakṣāntaramāhuḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:1043_0: candrikāyāṃ tu pūrvapūrvasmin uttarottarasminnuktāprācuryeṇeti ṭīkārthamāśritya samānādhikaraṇānāṃ
GSP33bbdip11u:1045: yaḥ pracuraviṣṇupādaikasaṃśrayatvādimān - itare tvapracure - sa uttamādhikārīti tallakṣaṇamedāt traividhyopapattiriti uktam /
GSP33bbdip11u:1054: tatkutaḥ? udāhṛtapramāṇe brahmavidyāyāmiti kaṇṭhato 'nukteḥ kutaśca tatrādhikāratraividhyamityata āha - 'adhyayana'; iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:1068: “śānto dānta uparatastitikṣuḥ samāhito bhūtvā ātmanyevātmānaṃ paśyet“(bṛ-u. 6-4-23)
GSP33bbdip11u:1078: tattvapradīpe tu - vaiṣṇavasiddhāntādacalanaṃ śama iti paryavasitamuktam /
GSP33bbdip11u:1082: bṛhadbhāṣyarītyā - upa samīpe svahṛdayesthe viṣṇau santoṣavāniti vā /
GSP33bbdip11u:1086: iti vacanāt samaṃ yathārthamāhitamādhānaṃ manovṛttirūpaṃ jñānaṃ icchā ca yasya sa tathoktaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:1097: śāntādirbhūtvātmānaṃ vidyādityanena upanayanasya adhyayanārthatvavat śāntyāderbrahmavidyārthatvamuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33bbdip11u:1098: yadyapi paśyatīti śrutipāṭhaḥ tathāpi viṣṇutattvanirṇayaṭīkāyāṃ “sa tathā cakāreti kvacitpāṭhaḥ sa sadṛśaśākhāntaragato jñātavyaḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:1099: evamanyatrāpi“ityuktatvāt tannyāyenāyamapi sadṛśaśākhāntaragato vā paśyatītyasyārthānuvādo vetyadoṣaḥ// @#----------
GSP33bbdip11u:1129: yadvā - samprāptau sampuṭīkṛtau ariktau vā pāṇī yasya /
GSP33bbdip11u:1136: parito vīkṣya pāralaukikatvena tadviparītānapi karmabhiścitān svargādilokān vināśina eva parīkṣya tebhyo 'nirvedamāyāt'; /
GSP33bbdip11u:1142: atrāpi vijñānapadena brahmajñāniparabrāhmaṇapadena ca uttamādhikārī sūcitaḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:1171: iti prameyadīpoktarītyā vṛṇuta ityanena bhaktatvaṃ sūcitam /
GSP33bbdip11u:1179: yasya deve parā bhaktiryathā deve tathā gurau /
GSP33bbdip11u:1181: sā ca bhaktiḥ viṣṇau sarvādhikā anyeṣvapi yathāyogyā brahmavidyopayoginītyarthe śvetāśvatarāṇāṃ śrutiṃ (śve. 6-23)
GSP33bbdip11u:1197: anyeṣu svottameṣu ca yathā yogyā bhaktirasti / @#----------
GSP33bbdip11u:1227: kintu “bhaktyā tvananyayā śakya ahamevaṃ vidhorjuna jñātuṃ draṣṭuṃ“(bha.gī. 11-54)
GSP33bbdip11u:1230: nanu yadyadhyayanavatāmeva brahmavidyādhikāraḥ tarhi trivarṇetareṣāmadhyayanābhāvenādhikāro na syāt /
GSP33bbdip11u:1231: tataśca teṣāṃ brahmajñānābhāvena mokṣābhāvassyādityāśaṅkāṃ smṛtyā pariharati - 'vyomasaṃhitāyāṃ ca'; iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:1242: ayaṃ cārtho “viṣṇunāmasvādhyāyo 'ntyānāṃ“ityetadavatārikārūpatayā “nāgnirna yajñaḥ śūdrasyetyādestrivarṇabāhyānāṃ“iti nyāyadīpikayā sūcitaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:1247: kintu ye antyajāḥ trivarṇabāhyāḥ śūdrādayaḥ pulkasāntāḥ te yadyapi vaidikabrahmajñānānadhikāriṇaḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:1248: tathāpi yato bhaktāḥ ato nāmajñānādhikāriṇaḥ viṣṇunāmajñānatatsvādhyāyādhikāriṇaḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:1257: striyaśca śūdrāśca brahmabandhavo brāhmaṇābhāsāśca teṣāmiti vigrahaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:1265: ekadeśe parokte tu na tu granthapurassare /
GSP33bbdip11u:1272: pareṇānyena parārthaṃ prokte ārabdha evetyāha - 'ekadeśa'; iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:1276: anena strīśūdrādimātraṃ puraskṛtya purāṇādigranthapravacanamapi na kāryamityuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33bbdip11u:1283: pariśeṣāt traivarṇikānāṃ cet - teṣāmapi kiṃ sarveṣāmadhikāraḥ?
GSP33bbdip11u:1294: “(maṃ-pra-16-2) ityādau strīṇāmapi vedādhikāradarśanāt kathaṃ tāsāmanadhikāra ityata uktasyāpavādamāha - 'āhuḥ'; iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:1299: tathāca - na kevalamuttamānāṃ devānāṃ strīṇāṃ nāmādijñāne 'dhikāraḥ kintu vaidike 'pi jñāne vedotpannabrahmavidyāyāmapi vaidikāḥ adhikāramāhuriti yojanā / @#----------
GSP33bbdip11u:1302: yathorvaśī yamī caiva śacyādyāśca tathāparāḥ // iti //
GSP33bbdip11u:1329: tathāca - yatassukhameva me syāt duḥkhamīṣadapi mābhūditi sarvābhimato 'mokṣaḥ';
GSP33bbdip11u:1335_0: uktaṃ hi śabdādhikaraṇe tattvapradīpe “mokṣasyaiva paramapuruṣārthatvāt tasya ca
GSP33bbdip11u:1335_1: samīco vinā viṣṇuprasādāt alabhyatvāt tasya ca atimātrasya aparokṣajñānaprasādhyatvāt
GSP33bbdip11u:1338: anena sūtre yato nārāyaṇaprasādamṛte na mokṣaḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:1344: ato brahmajijñāsā kartavyetyanvayapradarśanamukhena ataśśabdasya mokṣasādhanaprasādasādhanajñānasādhanatvāditi heturartha ityetadvivṛtaṃ bhavati /
GSP33bbdip11u:1345: evaṃ yato nārāyaṇaprasādamṛte na jñānaṃ na jijñāsā kintu prasādenaiva iti yojanāyāṃ ataḥśabdasyārthāntaramapi vivṛtaṃ bhavati /
GSP33bbdip11u:1351: vākyaṃ veti satāṃ nītiḥ sāvakāśe na tadbhavatet //
GSP33bbdip11u:1355: iti padasyaiva adhyāhāraḥ kutaḥ adhyāhārasya niraṅkuśatvena 'na kartavyā';
GSP33bbdip11u:1356: iti vākyasyaivādhyāhāraḥ kiṃ na syādityata āha - 'yatra'; iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:1368: yatra vākye yasmin vākye sāvakāśe arthāntare ghaṭanāvati sati tadeva padaṃ niyamena pratiṣṭhitaṃ prāptaṃ na bhavet /
GSP33bbdip11u:1369: evaṃ yatra mahāvākye yadavāntaravākyaṃ vinānyatrānavasaraḥ tatra mahāvākye tadeva vākyaṃ pratiṣṭhitaṃ,
GSP33bbdip11u:1370: yatra yasmin mahāvākye sāvakāśe sati tadavāntaravākyaṃ niyamena pratiṣṭhitaṃ na bhavedityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:1371: yatra vākye yatpadaṃ vākyaṃ vāpekṣitaṃ anyatrānyasyānavasara iti vā /
GSP33bbdip11u:1386: ityanena prasādasya mokṣasādhanatvaṃ tatkuta ityatastatra śrutiṃ pramāṇayati - 'taṃ'; iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:1398: prasādasya mokṣasādhanatvaṃ tu ṭīkāsudhoktarītyā prasādaṃ vinā vidvatpadalakṣyāparokṣajñānamātreṇa mokṣo na bhavatītyanyathānupapattyaiva,
GSP33bbdip11u:1403: “priyo hi jñāninotyarthamahaṃ sa ca mama priyaḥ”/
GSP33bbdip11u:1407: iti yadaparokṣajñānasya prasādasādhanatvamuktaṃ tatkuta ityatastatra gītāsmṛtimāha 'priyo hi'; iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:1416: “ātmā vā are draṣṭavyaḥ śrotavyo mantavyo nididhyāsitavyaḥ“
GSP33bbdip11u:1420: kintu śrutyā cetyāśayena tatra kaṭhaśrutimāha 'yaṃ'; iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:1429: ata eva viṣṇutattvanirṇayaṭīkāyām “eṣa paramātmā yaṃ vṛṇute yasya prasīdati tenaiva labhyaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:1430: kathaṃ? yatastasya svāṃ tanuṃ vivṛṇute prakāśayati,
GSP33bbdip11u:1431: tataścāsya svāṃ tanuṃ avidyāvṛtasvarūpāṃ vivṛṇute āvirbhāvayati“iti prakṛtānukūlatayā samagravākyārtha uktaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:1432: yatpūrvaṃ jijñāsāyāḥ aparokṣajñānasādhanatvamupaskṛtavākyenoktaṃ tatra pramāṇatevana śrutimāha 'ātmā'; iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:1463: prasādasya mokṣasādhanatābodhake “tamevaṃ vidvān“yamevaiṣa vṛṇute“ityādāviva “priyo hi“iti vākye 'nyaniṣedhābhāvādityāśṅkāṃ smṛtyā pariharati - 'karmaṇā'; iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:1492: iti śruteḥ kāmyakarmaṇāṃ vairāgyajananadvārā mokṣe 'pyupayogo 'stīti jñātavyam /
GSP33bbdip11u:1493: evaṃ akāmyakarmasādhyāt adhamaprasādāt antaḥkaraṇaśuddhyādidvārā mokṣo bhavatītyapi jñātavyam /
GSP33bbdip11u:1494: na ca adhamaprasādaśūnyānāṃ atidveṣiṇāṃ duryodhanādīnāṃ kathaṃ svargaprāptiriti vācyam,
GSP33bbdip11u:1498: yānti svargaṃ tataḥ kṣipraṃ tamondhaṃ prāpnuvanti ca //
GSP33bbdip11u:1500_0: iti / svargaloka ityuktyā tatraiva “mokṣaḥ sāṅkalpikaḥ svargaḥ bhūtāditvaṃ phalaṃ
GSP33bbdip11u:1500_1: kramāt“iti vacanokto yo nityasaṃsāribhī rājasarājasai rājasatāmasaiśca prāpya svargapratinidhitvena
GSP33bbdip11u:1500_2: kalpito daityendralokaḥ sāṅkalpikaḥ svargaḥ sa iha na vivakṣitaḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:1501: kintu saptalokāntargato rājasasāttvikaiḥ prāpyaḥ svargaloka eveti sūcitam / @#----------
GSP33bbdip11u:1507: ityatra tu janatyāgena janākhyalokasyaiva pratipattayarthaṃ lokaśabdaprayoga iti jñeyam /
GSP33bbdip11u:1511: viṣṇoḥ prasādāt janalokasyādirmaharlokaḥ janatapolokādireva vā bhavati na muktiḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:1515_0: tathā ca karmādinā bhagavatprasādasiddhāvapi tasyānuttamatvāt jñānasādhyasyaivottamatvāt
GSP33bbdip11u:1515_1: anuttamena svargādimātrasiddhāvapi mokṣāsiddheḥ tatsādhanaprasādāya jñānamapekṣitamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:1516: na cātra “īyustrīn karmaṇā lokān jñānenaiva taduttarān“iti vākyavirodhaḥ śaṅkyaḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:1526: śravaṇaṃ mananaṃ caiva dhyānaṃ bhaktistathaiva ca /
GSP33bbdip11u:1529_0: tathāpi “karmaṇā jñānamātanoti“ityādeḥ karmādināpi jñānaṃ bhavatīti na tadarthaṃ
GSP33bbdip11u:1553: na caitāni vinā kaścit jñānamāpa kutaścana //
GSP33bbdip11u:1556: viparītaṃ kiṃ na syādityata āha - 'na ca'; iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:1562: evametāni śravaṇādīni santicet kutaśca karmādervinā jñānaṃ nāpeti neti yojanā /
GSP33bbdip11u:1563: tathā ca nirapekṣānvayavyatirekābhyāṃ śravaṇādyeva jñāne pradhānaṃ sākṣātsādhanaṃ,
GSP33bbdip11u:1564: karmādi tu tadabhāvāt pāramparyeṇa sādhanamiti na vaiparītyamiti bhāvaḥ /

GSP33bbdip11u:1574: nanu nārāyaṇaprasādamṛte na mokṣaścet tarhi tajjijñāsaiva kartavyā na brahmajijñāsā /

GSP33bbdip11u:1576: brahmaśabdasya bahvarthatvena sūtrakāravivakṣāviśeṣasya durjñeyatvādityata āha - 'brahma'; iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:1581: tathā ca brahmaśabdasyānekārthatve 'pi yataḥ saḥ viṣṇāveva mukhyaḥ ato mukhyāmukhyayormukhyasyaiva grāhyatvāt sa eva sūtrakāravivakṣito jñāyata iti yojanā /
GSP33bbdip11u:1582_0: atra śabdāntaraṃ vihāya viṣṇuśabdaprayogeṇa tacchabdagatānāṃ vargapañcamaṣaṣṭhacaturthānāṃ
GSP33bbdip11u:1582_1: ṇaṣavānāṃ saṅkhyārekhālekhanena sūtrāṇāṃ catuṣṣaṣṭyuttarapañcaśatasaṅkhyoktā bhavati / yadvā -
GSP33bbdip11u:1588: tattvapradīpe 'pyetadeva 'yaśca devatāmīmāṃsānte “viṣṇureva hi tat śrutestaṃ brahmetyācakṣate“iti sarvadevottamatvena pratijñāto brahmatvena coktaḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:1595: brahmaśabdasyānyatrāpi rūḍhatvādrūḍhereva mukhyavṛttitvātkuto 'sau viṣṇāveva mukhya ityata āha - 'yaṃ'; iti/

GSP33bbdip11u:1641: ityanenaiva siddhe yajñāṅgatvādinā viśiṣṭānāṃ vrīhyoṣadhīnāṃ grahaṇāya punarvacanam /
GSP33bbdip11u:1667: ādyapakṣe 'pi vi ā sasarjetyavayavavibhāgaḥ tatrāṅgo hrasvatvaṃ chāndasaṃ bahulagrahaṇāt /
GSP33bbdip11u:1668: “indrā varuṇa vāmaham“iti śrutau ṇakārātparasyākārasya yathā hrasvatvaṃ tadvaditi nārāyaṇapaṇḍitācāryoktiḥ/
GSP33bbdip11u:1675: “yaṃ puruṣaṃ samudre 'ntaḥ kavayo vayanti vāñchanti tadakṣare yasmin tasmin akṣare nāśavarjite parame prajāstadādhārāḥ tiṣṭhanti,
GSP33bbdip11u:1676_0: jagataḥ prasūtī jagajjanayitrī prakṛtiḥ yataḥ prasūtā prādurbhūtā satī toyena itaramiśritena
GSP33bbdip11u:1676_2: tadevābādhitarūpatvātsatyaṃ tadeva kavīnāmabhimataṃ paraṃ brahma“ityartha uktaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:1678_0: iti paṭhitvā “yamavayanti avagacchanti yasmiṃstasmin akṣare prajāḥ santi yataḥ prasūtā
GSP33bbdip11u:1678_1: parādhīnaviśeṣaṃ prāptā śrīḥ toyena karmaṇā jīvān bhūmyāṃ prakṛtyāṃ vyasasarja“ityanvayena
GSP33bbdip11u:1712: ityādītaraśabdaśravaṇāt rudrāderapi mukhyabrahmatā prāptetyata āha - 'na ca'; iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:1718: nāmani viśvābhi na santi loke yadāvirāsīdanṛtasya sarvam /
GSP33bbdip11u:1720: kuta ityatastatprāpakaśabdānāṃ viṣṇāveva mukhyatvāditi hetūpaskārabhipretya tasyāsiddhiparihārāya viṣṇormukhyataḥ sarvanāmavācyatve śrutimāha - 'nāmāni'; iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:1734: nāmāni sarvāṇi yamāviśanti taṃ vai viṣṇuṃ paramamudāharanti //
GSP33bbdip11u:1736: tarhi kasmin tāni mukhyānītyata āha 'nāmāni'; iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:1749: mukhyato na santi mukhyato na lokavācakāni 'yat'; yasmāt,
GSP33bbdip11u:1762: “yo devānāṃ nāmadhā eva eva taṃ sampraśnaṃ bhuvanā yantyanyā“
GSP33bbdip11u:1766: nanu yathā viṣṇoḥ śrutyantarasiddhasarvanāmatvenātroktaṃ brahmatvaṃ siddhyati tathā rudrādīnāmapi viṣṇvādiśabdavācyatvena atroktaṃ brahmatvaṃ kiṃ na syādityata āha - 'yaḥ'; iti /

GSP33bbdip11u:1790: utsargato liṅgāt śruteḥ prābalye 'pi sāvakāśāyā viśvakarmaśruteḥ niravakāśaliṅgena bādhopapatteriti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:1801: nābhyarpitaṃ padmādanyatkiṃ na syādityata āha - 'na ca'; iti /

GSP33bbdip11u:1827: viśvasya jagato vibhūtayaḥ sṛṣṭyādyaṣṭakaṃ jīvādau vyastāḥ vistṛtāḥ jaḍādau samastāḥ saṃkṣiptāḥ viśvavibhūtayo yenāsau vyastasamastaviśvavibhūtistasmai 'lokakartre';
GSP33bbdip11u:1829: tattvapradīpe tu - samastaviśvavibhūtayo yena vyastā sa vyastasamastaviśvavibhūtiḥ /

GSP33bbdip11u:1846: yadā niravakāśaliṅgamātraṃ śrutibādhakaṃ tadā kimu vācyaṃ samākhyāyuktaṃ taditi bhāvenāha - 'para'; iti/
GSP33bbdip11u:1849: tathā ca yataḥ viśvakarmasūkte “paro divā para enā pṛthivyā paro devebhirasurairyadasti“iti yā ākhyā uktiḥ tasyāḥ samā samānā 'paro divā';
GSP33bbdip11u:1855: “yaṃ kāmaye taṃ tamugraṃ kṛṇomi taṃ brahmāṇaṃ tamṛṣiṃ taṃ sumedhām“

GSP33bbdip11u:1866: ahamiti prakṛtā lakṣmīḥ “yaṃ“ityādivākyena brahmādīnāṃ svādhīnatvamuktvā “mama yonirapsvantaḥ samudre” iti vākyena “paro divā“ityuktaṃ viṣṇuṃ svakāraṇatvena samudrasthatvena cāha,
GSP33bbdip11u:1868: uktvetyanena lakṣmīkāraṇaṃ brahmādyanyatamaṃ kiṃ na syāditi śaṅkā vāritā /
GSP33bbdip11u:1885: ahametāvatī yathoktaprakārā mahimnā nāto 'dhiketi vā śrutyarthaḥ /

GSP33bbdip11u:1915: nanvatra samudrastho rudraḥ kiṃ na syāt 'tapyamānāya salile';
GSP33bbdip11u:1919: tathā ca atrogra ityukto rudra eva bhavet,
GSP33bbdip11u:1934: nanu prasiddhyādisadbhāve 'pi tatparityāgenānyasvīkāre kiṃ bādhakamityata āha - 'na ca'; iti/
GSP33bbdip11u:1947: yato 'tra yadi rudro lakṣmyadhīnatayograpadenocyate tarhi “viśvādhiko rudraḥ“ityādiśrutivirodhaḥ syāt ato 'tra tatparityāgo yukta ityata āha - 'ukta'; iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:1955: viśvo vāyuḥ adhiko yasmādviśvādhika ityarthāśrayaṇena vā 'etameva';

GSP33bbdip11u:1989: tatra rudrādīnāṃ sarvottamatvasya sarvakāraṇatvasya cokteḥ ityata āha - 'na ca'; iti/

GSP33bbdip11u:2004: na ca asya 'na mohaśāstrasya vaktā viṣṇurāśaṅkyaḥ,

GSP33bbdip11u:2062: liṅgamūlānveṣaṇakathā tu - pūrvaṃ jagatkartṛtvaviṣaye viṣṇuviriñcayorvivādo 'bhūt ahameva jagataḥ kartā na matto 'nyaḥ iti /

GSP33bbdip11u:2154: tarhi vaiṣṇaveṣu rāmakṛṣṇādiviṣṇukartṛkaśivastutyādi kathamucyata ityata āha - 'tacca'; iti /

GSP33bbdip11u:2175_1: tasya lakṣaṇānyāha tānyanena sūtreṇa bhagavānāha“iti tattvapradīpokteḥ tacchabdādhyāhāreṇa bhāṣyārtha uktaḥ /

GSP33bbdip11u:2181: tathāpi bhāṣyakārairuktatve 'pi sūtrakṛtānuktatvāt brahma kiṃ jīva uta viṣṇuriti bhavatyeva sandehaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:2184: yadvā - “janmādyasya yata iti sūtre śrutamiti vākyaśeṣaḥ”/

GSP33bbdip11u:2200: mokṣaṃ ca viṣṇutaścaiva jñātvā muktirna cānyathā //

GSP33bbdip11u:2212: tasya viṣṇvekaniṣṭhatvameva kuto jñāyata ityata āha - 'utpatti'; iti /

GSP33bbdip11u:2232_1: tatrānupalambhakṛtāsambhavaṃ vā nirākartuṃ jagatkāraṇatvalakṣaṇaṃ jijñāsye brahmaṇi
GSP33bbdip11u:2234: bhūtaśabdaḥ “astitvādbhūtanāmabhyaḥ sarvajīvebhya eva yat“iti gītātātparyanirṇayavacanājjīvavācī tadupalakṣitasarvajagatparaḥ /

GSP33bbdip11u:2275: - deveṣu yaugiko 'yaṃ śabdaḥ - viśeṣeṇādhikān devān kimutānyān 'vṛttaṃ cakraṃ na';
GSP33bbdip11u:2279: aṣṭau vasavaḥ ekādaśa rudrāḥ viṣṇuvyatiriktaikādaśādityāḥ hiraṇyagarbheṇa saha daśa prajeśvarāḥ pradhānena pañcāśanmaruta iti navatiḥ /

GSP33bbdip11u:2291: na te viṣṇo jāyamāno na jāto devamahimnaḥ paramantamāpa //

GSP33bbdip11u:2318: upalakṣaṇaṃ caitat janiṣyamāṇo na prāpsyatītyapi draṣṭavyam /
GSP33bbdip11u:2319: ata eva tattvapradīpe - “paro mātrayā tanvā vṛdhāna /
GSP33bbdip11u:2321: ubhe te vidma rajasī pṛthivyā viṣṇo devatvaṃ paramasya vitse /
GSP33bbdip11u:2322: na te viṣṇo jāyamāno na jāto devamahimnaḥ paramantamāpa /
GSP33bbdip11u:2323: udastabhnā nākamṛṣvaṃ bṛhantaṃ dādhartha prācīṃ kakubhaṃ pṛthivyāḥ“iti ṛgdvayamevameva vyākhyātam /
GSP33bbdip11u:2324: tathā hi - mātrāyāḥ paraḥ parimāṇātītaḥ tanvā vṛdhānaḥ tanvā vardhamānaḥ dehena pūrṇaḥ - itthaṃ bhāve tṛtīyā -
GSP33bbdip11u:2327: te mahitvaṃ mahimānaṃ nānubhavanti na prāpnuvanti ca /
GSP33bbdip11u:2328: te tvadīyāyāḥ pṛthivyāḥ prakṛteḥ rajasī rajoguṇakārye ubhe puṇyapāpe vayaṃ vidmaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:2331: tvameva mahimnaḥ mahimasamudāyasyāntaṃ brahmaṇaḥ śriyo vā mahimānamatiśayito hi viṣṇumahimā anyamahimnāṃ param antaṃ te mahimānaṃ na kañcidāpa /
GSP33bbdip11u:2334: bṛhantaṃ pūrṇaṃ lokam udastabhnāḥ udastabhnaḥ uccairastambhayaḥ /
