GSP33bbdip11u:2339: yo naḥ pitā janitā yo vidhātā dhāmāni veda bhavanāni viśvā //
GSP33bbdip11u:2370: tathā ca - śivo jagajjanmādikartā sarvajñatvāt vyatirekeṇa yajñadattavat ityādyanumānāt viṣṇoḥ 'anye';
GSP33bbdip11u:2376: yathā vā “sarvendriyavivarjitatvādyartha uktaḥ“iti gītābhāṣyaprameyadīpe ādītyataḥ paraṃ śabdaśabdo 'dhyāhārya ityuktestatra yathā madhye 'dhyāhāraḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:2377: yathā vā “puruṣādvadhavikārasamūhatenakṛteṣu“iti mahābhāṣyavākye samāsamadhye teneti padādhyāhāraḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:2379: tathā ca ṛgādirūpaṃ śāstraṃ ca tadekamasahāyaṃ ca jñaptiyonirjñaptikāraṇaṃ yasya vastunaḥ tattathoktaṃ tasya bhāvastattvaṃ tasmāditisūtrārthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:2380: anena na jagatkāraṇamānumānikaṃ tasya śāstraikasamadhigamyatvāt dharmādivat ityanumānamuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33bbdip11u:2383: tathā ca - anumānādanyeṣāṃ jagatkāraṇatāsādhanamayuktamiti na teṣu lakṣaṇasyātivyāptiriti bhāvaḥ / @#----------
GSP33bbdip11u:2391: kāraṇasya śāstraikavedyatvaṃ kuta ityata āha - 'na'; iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:2404: yadvā - sarvamanubhāvayatīti sarvānubhustaṃ ātmānaṃ sarvajagatkartāraṃ sarvasvāminaṃ vā /
GSP33bbdip11u:2405: 'sāmparāye'; samyakparasyāyaḥ prāptiḥ samparāyaḥ sa eva sāmparāyaḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:2409: tathā ca sadāgamatadarthājñānī vedaviruddhajñānī vā 'na manute'; na jānāti,
GSP33bbdip11u:2411: kintu vedavideva jānāti veda eva pramāpayatīti prathamaśrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:2412: puruṣo jagatkartā ā aupaniṣadaḥ upaniṣadekasamadhigamya ityanyaśrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:2420: tathā caivamādiśrutibhyaḥ kāraṇasya śāstraikayonitvāvagamāt nāsiddhiriti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:2428: aupaniṣadasyāpi kāraṇasyānumānena siddhiḥ kiṃ na syādityata āha - 'na ca'; iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:2433: tathā ca - na tenānyasya jagatkartṛtāsādhanaṃ yuktamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:2435: ityadhikaraṇe svātantryādihetunā viṣṇoḥ pūrṇatvādisiddhyaṅgīkārādityata uktam - 'niyata'; iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:2438: tathā ca - anumānatvādeva na tasya svātantryeṇādṛṣṭārthaniścāyakatvaṃ,
GSP33bbdip11u:2442: tacca na svātantryādihetāvasti śrutisāhāyyarahitatvena svatantratvānna pramāṇatvamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:2459: uktaṃ hi gītābhāṣye - “sa niścayena yoktavyaḥ yoktavya eva bubhūṣuṇetyarthaḥ“iti uktaṃ hi prameyadīpikāyām “ayogavyavacchede niścayaśabdaḥ“iti / @#----------
GSP33bbdip11u:2473: evaṃ śrutismṛtisahāyo yastarkaḥ viṣṇuḥ svatantraḥ pūrṇatvāditi samavyāptikānumānaṃ so 'pi pramāṇapadavīṃ gacchedityanvayaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:2487: upakramopasaṃhārāvirodhena tadaikarūpyeṇa-liṅgāntarasyāpyupalakṣaṇametat - tathā ca - upakramāditātparyaliṅgaiḥ atra tātparyaviṣayārtho 'yameva bhavedityādyaṃ yat 'ūhanaṃ';
GSP33bbdip11u:2491: śrutismṛtisahāyarahitaṃ tannirapekṣaṃ cetanatvādi tarkaṃ tu varjayet,
GSP33bbdip11u:2504: na kevalaṃ śrutyādisāhityahīnānumānasya prāmāṇyābhāve sādhaka sadbhāvaḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:2505: api tu tatprāmāṇyābhyupagame bādhakaṃ cāstītyāha - 'śakyatvāt'; iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:2516: tasmānna sā śaktimatī vināgamamudīkṣitum // iti vārāhe /
GSP33bbdip11u:2539: nanvatīndriyārthābhāvena pratyakṣetarasyāprāmāṇyātkathaṃ śāstrādīśvarasiddhiriti nāstikyavādaṃ mokṣadharmavacanena nirācaṣṭe - reta iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:2540: reta ityādiprathamaikavacanāntānāṃ padānāṃ pratyekaṃ pramāṇamiti padenānvayaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:2543: atīndriyārthasattve anumānādiprāmāṇye ca pramāṇaṃ pramāpakaṃ bhavatītyarthaḥ/
GSP33bbdip11u:2544: bhāṣyakārīyadvitīyetiśabdasya evaṃ mokṣadharmavacanātpratītairhetubhirnāstikyavādo na yujyata iti yojanā /
GSP33bbdip11u:2550: yadvā - nyāyadīpikoktarītyā - āstikyaṃ dharmādāvastyanena prayojanamiti bhāvo buddhiḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:2555: mṛtaśarīre siktasya retasaḥ śarīrākāraṇatvena yadadhiṣṭhite śarīre siktaṃ retaḥ śarīrātmanā pariṇamati tajjīvasiddhiḥ/
GSP33bbdip11u:2556: vandhyādisarvaśarīre siktasya retasaḥ kāryākaratvena yatpreritaṃ retaḥ kāryakaraṃ tadīśvarādṛṣṭasiddhiḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:2586: na ca tanmṛtaśarīre pātrāntare vā nihitaṃ pacyate /
GSP33bbdip11u:2592: tathā ca - maraṇena dehasya pṛthivyādipañcabhūteṣu layo bhavati,
GSP33bbdip11u:2606: tathā ca svādhyāyabrahmacaryādirūpātyutkaṭatapaādiphalasya tejassvitvādeḥ pratyakṣata eva darśanācca na nāstikyavādo yujyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:2614: tarhi pāśupatādiśāstreṇa rudrāderjagatkāraṇatvasiddhiḥ syādityata āha - ṛgiti /
GSP33bbdip11u:2624: ato 'nyo granthavistāro naiva śāstraṃ kuvartma tat //
GSP33bbdip11u:2649: ityārabhya vedapañcarātrayoraikyābhiprāyeṇa pañcarātrasyaiva prāmāṇyamuktamitareṣāṃ bhinnamatatvaṃ pradarśya mokṣadharmeṣvapi //
GSP33bbdip11u:2659: ityuttaravākyena sāṅkhyādiṣu prakṛteṣvapi tatparityāgena pañcarātrasyaiva prāmāṇyarūpamādhikyamuktaṃ yato 'taḥ pāśupatādikaṃ kuvartma amānameveti /
GSP33bbdip11u:2673: tathā ca pañcarātrasya vedasamānārthatvena tatprāmāṇyoktau vedaprāmāṇyamevoktaṃ bhavatīti na tasyāprāmāṇyamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:2674: na caikyābhiprāyaḥ kutaḥ kalpyata iti vācyam,
GSP33bbdip11u:2677: kapilo vāsudevākhyaḥ tantraṃ sāṅkhyaṃ jagāda ha /
GSP33bbdip11u:2687: ata eva tattvapradīpe - mokṣadharmeṣviti bahuvacanaṃ dharmabhedādityuktam /
GSP33bbdip11u:2694: viruddhanāmapi matānāṃ na sarveṣāṃ prāmāṇyaṃ sambhavati vastuno bahurūpatvābhāvāt,
GSP33bbdip11u:2696: tatra kasya prāmāṇyaṃ kasya vāprāmāṇyamiti punaryudhiṣṭhirajanamejayahārdapraśnottaramāha bhīṣmo vaiśampāyanaśca /
GSP33bbdip11u:2697: “sāṅkhyasya vaktā kapilaḥ“ityārabhya “pañcarātrasya kṛtsnasya“ityanena jñāneṣu jñānasādhaneṣu etatpañcarātram /
GSP33bbdip11u:2698: abhiprāyastu paramāptatamena nārāyaṇena sarvasya pañcarātrasya kṛtatvātprāmāṇyaṃ tāvatsiddham,
GSP33bbdip11u:2702: upalakṣaṇāmaṅgīkṛtyaikavākyatāyāṃ ca svīkṛtāyāṃ vedapañcarātrayoreva prāmāṇayaṃ siddhyati /
GSP33bbdip11u:2708: evaṃ sūtraṃ vyākhyāya yatpareṇoktaṃ śāstrasya yoniriti tadayuktamiti bhāvena svābhimatārthaṃ darśayati - śāstramiti /
GSP33bbdip11u:2709: kāraṇārthakena yoniśabdena yogyatayā jñaptessambandhe pramāṇamiti paryavasyatītyabhiprāyeṇa 'yoniḥ pramāṇam';
GSP33bbdip11u:2715: tathā ca - śāstraṃ yoniḥ pramāṇaṃ yasya tacchāstrayonītyeva śāstrayonipadārtho brahma,
GSP33bbdip11u:2726_1: tasya lakṣaṇatvasiddhaye viṣṇoreva jagatkāraṇatvena śāstragamyatvaṃ netareṣāmapīti samarthyate /
GSP33bbdip11u:2734: śrutitātparyārthājñānibhirāpātataḥ jñāyamānamapi na kevalaṃ viṣṇoḥ kintu 'itareṣāṃ';
GSP33bbdip11u:2737: nanu pratītyāderajñānamūlatvādikaṃ parikalpyānyeṣāṃ kāraṇatayā śāstrayonitvāgrahaṇe ko heturiti pṛcchati - kuta iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:2746: anvīyate svārthena sambadhyate tatparatayā jñāyate śāstraṃ śabdo vānenetyanvayaḥ upapattyāditātparyaliṅgamityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:2751: atra vākye śrutyādiṣaṭkamapyādipadena grāhyamiti hi tasyārthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:2754: śrutirliṅgaṃ samākhyā ca vākyaṃ prakaraṇaṃ tathā /
GSP33bbdip11u:2757: uktaṃ hi pramāṇalakṣaṇaṭīkāyām “upakramādīnāṃ tātparyaliṅgatvameteṣāṃ punarartha eveti viśeṣajñāpanārtho yogavibhāgaḥ“iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:2758: na caivam “atra śrutyādiṣaṭkaṃ ca grāhyam“iti ṭīkāyāṃ tātparyagrāhakeṣvantarbhāvoktirayukteti vācyam,
GSP33bbdip11u:2762: ityādau śrutiliṅgādibhirāgamārthaniraṇayadarśanena teṣāmapi anvīyate śaktirūpasambandhavattayā jñāyate padajātamebhiritivyutpattyā anvayaśabdārthatvaucityāt /
GSP33bbdip11u:2763: na copakramopasaṃhārābhyāsāpūrvatāphalārthavādopapattayaḥ śrutiliṅgavākyaprakaraṇasthānasamākhyāśca tātparyaliṅgānīti jñānapādīyasudhāvirodha iti vācyam,
GSP33bbdip11u:2765: ata eva candrikāyāmupakramādipramāṇakaḥ śaktitātparyalakṣaṇassambandhaḥ samanvaya ityuktam /
GSP33bbdip11u:2768: anenātra bṛhatsaṃhitāvacanodāharaṇaṃ vakṣyamāṇasya śrutirliṅgamiti vacanasyopalakṣakamiti sūcitam / @#----------
GSP33bbdip11u:2776: kāni tānyupapattyādīni kutra ca liṅgānītyata āha - uktaṃ ceti /
GSP33bbdip11u:2800: smṛterupakramāditve 'pi virodhe uttarottaraprābalyasūcanāya bhāṣye upapattyādīti vyatyasyoktiḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:2802: yadvā - etaccopakramādi svārthe śabdātmakamapi idametatparam abādhe satyetadupakramatvāt
GSP33bbdip11u:2804: upapattistu yathāgnyādirūpasvarthe tathā tātparye 'pi ayametattātparyaviṣayaḥ upapannatvāt iti prakāreṇa liṅgarūpeti pṛthaguktiḥ / @#----------
GSP33bbdip11u:2826: liṅgairiti tṛtīyayā nirūpyamāṇe iti saptamīprayoge ca upakramādikaṃ tātparyahetuḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:2827: tātparyaṃ ca śāstrapramāṇakatve heturiti sūcitaṃ bhavati /
GSP33bbdip11u:2842: nanu karmavidhānādirūpaśāstrasya kathaṃ brahmaparatetyāśaṅkāṃ bhagavadvākyena pratiṣedhati - māmiti/
GSP33bbdip11u:2848: tathā ca “vasante vasante” ityādi karmavidhātrī śrutiḥ 'mām';
GSP33bbdip11u:2854: catvāri vākparimitā padāni tāni vidurbrāhmaṇā ye manīṣiṇaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:2855: guhā trīṇi nihitā neṅgayanti turīyaṃ vāco manuṣyā vadanti // (ṛ. 1-164-45.)
GSP33bbdip11u:2856: iti śrutyā yā vāgvaktṛttvānnimittādvākbdito hariḥ tasyā yāni sthānāpekṣayā 'parimitāni';
GSP33bbdip11u:2858: vāsudevādirūpāṇi tāni ye manīṣiṇaḥ brāhmaṇāḥ ta eva viduḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:2859: tatra vāco hṛdayaguhāyāṃ nihitāni vāsudevāditrīṇi rūpāṇi 'manuṣyāḥ';
GSP33bbdip11u:2866: tathā ca “niṣedhabuddhiviṣayamapriyaṃ hi hareḥ smṛtam“iti bhāgavatatātparyokteḥ surāpānādikaṃ madaprītisādhanatvāt niṣidhyate ityapriyadvārā 'na surāṃ pibet';
GSP33bbdip11u:2868: athavā - ahamapriyādapohyaḥ mamāprītikarātsurāpānaśabditāt “surā harerguṇā me syuḥ“iti cintanāttapadapekṣya apohyo niṣedhya ityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:2869: taduktaṃ bhāgavatatātparye - vidhirūpatvena kalpanaṃ vikalpaḥ catvāri vāgityādi /
GSP33bbdip11u:2873: ucyate sarvavedeṣu tacca veda sa eva hi // iti / tathā -
GSP33bbdip11u:2874: surā harerguṇāḥ proktāste me syuriti cintanam /
GSP33bbdip11u:2876: tattvapradīpe tu - 'dve vā va brahmaṇo rūpe';
GSP33bbdip11u:2877: iti vikalpya vividhaṃ kalpayitvā 'tatra yassa ātmā';
GSP33bbdip11u:2881: ṭīkākṛtpakṣe tu vikalpyaśabdassamāsāntargato vyasto veti viśeṣaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:2885: tathā ca hyevaṃbhūtāyā vidhiniṣedhādirūpāyā anyaparatvena pratītāyāścāsyāśśruteriti 'māṃ vidhatte';
GSP33bbdip11u:2889: ko 'pi viśeṣataḥ prāyaḥ na veda na jānātītyarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:2890: bhāgavata ityanantaraṃ tadeva śāstragamyamityuktatvāt na kathamitiśaṅkāvakāśa iti vākyaśeṣaḥ // 4 //
GSP33bbdip11u:2899: atrādhikaraṇe saṃśabdoktaṃ vācyatvaṃ kārtsnyaṃ cākṣipya samādhīyate /
GSP33bbdip11u:2905: pūrvasūtre tacchabdoktaṃ brahmaśabdagocaraṃ śāstroktaṃ kāraṇaṃ na, kutaḥ?
GSP33bbdip11u:2910: kutaḥ? yato na tadgocaraṃ jñānaviṣayaḥ na,
GSP33bbdip11u:2914: 'yato vācaḥ'; iti vākye avācyatvasya 'aprāpya manasā saha';
GSP33bbdip11u:2916: “trayī na śrutigocarā“ityatra gocaraśabdasya viśeṣyaliṅgatayā prayogāt 'na tacchabdagocaram'; iti sādhu /
GSP33bbdip11u:2917_0: sudhāyāṃ tu śabdānāṃ gavāṃ jñānānāṃ caraścaraṇaṃ vṛttiryasmin tacchabdagocaramiti
GSP33bbdip11u:2922: taṃ brahmaṇa ānandaṃ vidvānna bibheti ityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:2931: na vidyate śabdo guṇaḥ pramāṇaṃ vā yasmiṃstattathoktam /
GSP33bbdip11u:2933: 'asparśaṃ'; sparśaguṇaśūnyaṃ tata eva sparśaliṅgāviṣayaḥ tadbhinnaṃ ca,
GSP33bbdip11u:2954: 'yadvācānabhyuditaṃ yena vāgabhyudyate ... yacchrotreṇa na śruṇoti yena śrotramidaṃ śrutam'
GSP33bbdip11u:2962: yenedaṃ śrotraṃ śrutaṃ tadeva brahma tvaṃ viddhītyarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:2976: tathā ca atra sūtrakāraḥ iti pūrvapakṣyuktaṃ śrutitātparyāparijñānaprāptaṃ brahmaṇo 'vācyatvaṃ neti niṣedhatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:2980: na vidyate śabdo vācako yasya tadaśabdam /
GSP33bbdip11u:2991: īkṣaṇīyatvāt jñānaviṣayatvādityarthaḥ ityāśayena sūtraṃ vyācaṣṭe - sa iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:2993_0: atra “yaḥ punaretaṃ trimātreṇaumityanenaivākṣareṇa paraṃ puruṣamabhidhyāyīta sa tejasi
GSP33bbdip11u:2993_1: sūrye sampanno yathā pādodarastavacā vinirmucyate evaṃ ha vai sa pāpmanā vinirmuktaḥ
GSP33bbdip11u:2993_2: sa sāmabhirunnīyate brahmalokam“iti pūrvavākye prakṛto yaḥ akārokāramakārākhyāṃśatrayayuktapraṇavoktaprakāreṇa
GSP33bbdip11u:2993_4: satyākhyaṃ brahmalokaṃ prāptaḥ praṇavopāsako jīvaḥ saḥ 'jīvaghanāt';
GSP33bbdip11u:3031: tathāpi na tadanyathānupapattyā tasya vācyatvaṃ vācyaṃ pratyakṣādināpīkṣaṇīyatvopapatterityata āha - aupaniṣadatvāditi /
GSP33bbdip11u:3038: tathā ca śrutismṛtisāhāyyarahitapratyakṣādyavedyatvaviśiṣṭekṣaṇīyatvānyathānupapattyā brahmaṇo vācyatvaṃ siddhyatyeveti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3040: yojanā tu brahmaṇaśrutiṣūktaṃ īkṣaṇaṃ pramāṇenaiva hi bhavet /
GSP33bbdip11u:3042: vacanetarapramāṇenekṣaṇaṃ sambhavati aupaniṣadatvāt vacanenaiva bhavadīkṣaṇaṃ nāvacanena vacanavṛttyanyalakṣaṇādinā sambhavati /
GSP33bbdip11u:3045: avacanatvenāvācyatvena nimittena ataḥ pariśeṣādīkṣaṇaṃ vācyatvameva sādhayatīti / @#----------
GSP33bbdip11u:3048: 'sarve vedā yatpadamāmanti tapāṃsi sarvāṇi ca yadvadanti'; /
GSP33bbdip11u:3053: iti yuktitaḥ śruteḥ prābalyokterityataḥ sautro heturāgamopalakṣaka iti bhāvena vācyatve śrutismṛtī cāha - sarva iti //
GSP33bbdip11u:3075: ityavadhāraṇopapattaye mukhyatayā vedyatvasya vivakṣaṇīyatvāt tasya ca vācyatvaṃ vināyogātsarvaśabdalakṣaṇāyāścāsambhavādvācyatvamevābhyāṃ siddhyatīti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3092: avācyatvādivyapadeśo yujyata iti na tadvirodha iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3095: 'avacanena'; ityasya tu sākalyena vacanamantareṇetyartha ityuktaṃ bhavati / @#----------
GSP33bbdip11u:3098: na tadīdṛgiti jñeyaṃ na vācyaṃ na ca tarkyate /
GSP33bbdip11u:3099: paśyanto 'pi na paśyanti mero rūpaṃ vipaścitaḥ //
GSP33bbdip11u:3102: nanvaprasiddhinimittako 'vācyatvādivyapadeśaḥ kva dṛṣṭa ityata āha - na taditi /
GSP33bbdip11u:3114: tathā ca yathā merurūpe aprasiddhinimittakāvācyatvādivyapadeśastathā brahmaṇyapīti bhāvaḥ / @#----------
GSP33bbdip11u:3123: api tu smṛtisiddhā ceti bhāvenāha - aprasiddheriti /
GSP33bbdip11u:3127: evamaprasiddhiprasiddhibhyāṃ tat atarkyam anumeyaṃ ca ajñeyaṃ jñeyaṃ jñānipratyakṣagamyaṃ ca 'smṛtaṃ';
GSP33bbdip11u:3136: ityādiśrutīnāṃ yuktyādibalādarthāntaropapatterna tadbalācchabdāvācyaṃ brahmeti sūtraṃ vyākhyāyāpavyākhyāṃ pratyākhyāti - na ceti /
GSP33bbdip11u:3143: iti jagatkāraṇasyekṣaṇakartṛtvaśravaṇātpradhānasya cācetanatvena tadasambhavāditi sāṅkhyamatanirākaraṇaparatayā vyākhyāne prathamapratijñāyāṃ hetūkṛtam 'aśabdatvam';
GSP33bbdip11u:3152: yadvā - tattvapradīparītyā māyinā sāṅkhyaṃ prati hetutvenopanyastamaśabdatvaṃ māyītarasya sāṅkhyasya na siddhaṃ nāpi sāṅkhyetaramāyisiddhamuktahetubhyāmeva /
GSP33bbdip11u:3158: tathā ca hetudvayamapi svapakṣapratikūlamiti na paravyākhyā yukteti bhāvaḥ tattvapradīpe tu 'naca';
GSP33bbdip11u:3160: māyisiddhamaśabdatvaṃ na śrutyarthaḥ uktanyāyena brahmaṇo vācyatvāt /
GSP33bbdip11u:3162: avācyatvaṃ brahmaṇa itarasya māyino 'pi na siddham /
GSP33bbdip11u:3163: brahmaṇi vyavahārābhāvaprasaṅgāt iti dvedhā vyākhyāyaparakṛtavyākhyāpratyākhyānāya paroktahetoṣṭīkārītyāsiddhyuktiparatayāpi vyākhyātam // 5 // @#----------
GSP33bbdip11u:3168: īkṣaṇīyatvasya hetorvyadhikaraṇāsiddhimākṣipya samādhātuṃ sūtram - 'oṃ gauṇaścennātmaśabdāt'; iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:3171: sattvādiguṇabaddho jīva evātastadanyathānupapattyā vācyo 'pi sa eva syānna nirguṇaḥ paramātmeti cet - na, kutaḥ?
GSP33bbdip11u:3177: na ca gauṇa ātmā dṛśyo vācyaśca na nirguṇa iti yuktam /
GSP33bbdip11u:3183: jīvākhyo gauṇa eva atastadanyathānupapattyā vācyo 'pi sa eva syāt 'na nirguṇaḥ';
GSP33bbdip11u:3187: ato na sa vācyaḥ iti codyaṃ na yuktam /
GSP33bbdip11u:3190: iti vākye īkṣaṇīye tasmin ātmaśabdaśravaṇāddṛśyo nirguṇa eva,
GSP33bbdip11u:3191: ata evekṣatyā liṅgena vācyo 'pi sa eva bhavediti yojanā /
GSP33bbdip11u:3192: yadyapi sudhāyāṃ gauṇapadaṃ māyāśabalitaiśvaryādidharmayuktasaguṇabrahmaparatayā vyākhyātaṃ tathāpi pūrvapakṣiṇo māyāśabalitaṃ vā guṇabaddhā jīvā vā dṛśyā vācyāśca,
GSP33bbdip11u:3202: nanvātmaśabdasadbhāve kuto 'yaṃ nirguṇo na gauṇa ityata āha - ya iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:3205: sattvādibhiḥ śūnyaḥ yaśca dukhakhādidoṣarahitaḥ yaśca heyopādeyarahitaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3214: ya etadviruddhasvabhāvavān so 'nātmeti satāṃ mataṃ sammatamitythaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3228: 'dve vāva brahmaṇo rūpe ātmā caivānātmā ca /
GSP33bbdip11u:3229: tatra yaḥ sa ātmā sa nityaḥ śuddhaḥ kevalo nirguṇaśca /
GSP33bbdip11u:3234: 'brahmaṇaḥ'; parabrahmaṇaḥ rūpaṃ ca rūpaṃ ca rūpe /
GSP33bbdip11u:3235: tatrādyo rūpaśabdaḥ svarūpaparaḥ dvitīyo rūpyate jñāyate brahmākhyamiti vyutpattyā pratimāparaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3250: evaṃ prathamoddiṣṭātmaśabdārthaṃ lakṣaṇamukhena pradarśya athānātmānamuktalakṣaṇavyatirekamukhena darśayati - atheti /
GSP33bbdip11u:3255: 'brāhmaṇam'; ityanantaraṃ yato nirguṇasya viṣṇorevātmatvaṃ vaktīti śeṣaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3262: nanūpacāreṇāpyātmaśabdasya gauṇe prayogasadbhāvātsa eva śrutyukto dṛśya ātmā kiṃ na syādityata āha - na ceti /
GSP33bbdip11u:3263: 'mukhye'; ātmapadamukhyārthe nirguṇe dṛśyatayekṣatiśrutipratipādye sambhavati sati amukhyārthagauṇagrahaṇaṃ na yujyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3271: nanu ātmaśabdo mukhyata eva gauṇātmaparaḥ kiṃ na syāt /
GSP33bbdip11u:3273: tatrātmaśabdo nirguṇe viṣṇau mukhyo jīveṣvamukhya ityanukteḥ ātmanātmaśabdayoścetanācetanaviṣayatvasambhavāt /
GSP33bbdip11u:3278: duḥkhādidoṣasyaupādhikatvena jīvasyāpi svabhāvato nirdeṣatayā śruteḥ svabhāvaviṣayatvopapatterityāśaṅkāṃ parihartuṃ sūtraṃ paṭhati - oṃ tanniṣṭhasya iti//
GSP33bbdip11u:3287: tanniṣṭhasya mokṣopadeśe 'pi kuto 'yamātmā na gauṇa ityaprayojakatvamāśaṅkhyāha - na hīti /
GSP33bbdip11u:3296: yasyānuvittaḥ pratibuddha ātmā asmin sandohe gahane praviṣṭaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3297: sa viśvakṛtsa hi sarvasya kartā tasya lokaḥ sa u loka eva
GSP33bbdip11u:3301: asiddhiśaṅkāṃ parihartuṃ ko 'sāvātmaniṣṭhasya mokṣopadeśa ityatastaṃ darśayati - yasyeti /
GSP33bbdip11u:3310: sanduhyate puruṣārtho aneneti vā kāryakāraṇasaṅkhātarūpatvādvā bhūtasamudāyarūpatvādvā sandohanāmake madhyadehe sthite 'gahane';
GSP33bbdip11u:3322: kutaḥ? yataḥ sa hi paramātmā prasannaḥ sarvaśaktiḥ sarvamasya jñāninaḥ kāryaṃ karotītyuktam /
GSP33bbdip11u:3332: asya yata ityupadiśyate ato 'na gauṇa ātmā';
GSP33bbdip11u:3334: sūtrasya tu na gauṇa ātmaśabda iti pūrveṇānvayaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3341: ātmaśabdo viṣṇāveva mukhyaḥ na jīveṣvityatra na kevalaṃ tanniṣṭhasyetyādinoktamanumānaṃ mānam,
GSP33bbdip11u:3342: kintu sūtrakṛdabhipretāḥ spaṣṭaśrutismṛtayaśceti bhāvena tāṃ tāścāha - ayamiti /
GSP33bbdip11u:3352: cetanastu dvidhā prokto jīva ātmeti ca prabho /
GSP33bbdip11u:3362_0: advayaṃ samādhikaśūnyaṃ jñānasvarūpaṃ yattattvaṃ vadanti jñāninaḥ tat deśakālādiṣu
GSP33bbdip11u:3371: tathā ca - anasūyākhyā atribhāryā atreḥ sakāśāt 'ātmeśabrahmasambhavān';
GSP33bbdip11u:3372: ātmā viṣṇurīśorudraḥ brahmā caturmukhaḥ ātmā ceśaśca brahmā ca te tathoktāḥ taissaha bhavantītyātmeśabrahmasambhavāḥ tān 'akalmaṣān';
GSP33bbdip11u:3373: apāpān yo dattaḥ durvāsāḥ somaścaitān putrān 'jajñe';
GSP33bbdip11u:3376: te ca ātmeśabrahmasambhavā iti vipariṇāmena vyākhyeyam /
GSP33bbdip11u:3377: atra brahmāveśena sahotpanne candre niruktasambhavaśabdo mukhyaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3381: tathāpyanuvyākhyāne evaṃ paṭhitatvāttathaiva sudhāyāṃ vyākhyātatvāttadanyakalpīyaṃ pāṭhāntaraṃ bhaviṣyatītyadoṣaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3388: tathā ca - 'jīvāḥ brahmādayaḥ proktāḥ ātmā tu';
GSP33bbdip11u:3402: ātmajñānānmokṣopadeśe 'pi kuto netareṣāmātmatvaṃ teṣāmapi mokṣadātṛtvasambhavādityata āha - saguṇā iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:3411: tanniścayastu kuta ityata āha - paro hīti /
GSP33bbdip11u:3426: yuktyantareṇātmaśabdādito na gauṇa ityāha sūtrakṛt - heyatveti /
GSP33bbdip11u:3427: atra heyatvaṃ nāma mokṣārthaṃ prādhānyena jñeyatvenāvihitatvam /
GSP33bbdip11u:3428: tathā ca - na kevalaṃ tanniṣṭhasya mokṣopadeśāt,
GSP33bbdip11u:3432: jīvasya ca “anyā vāco vimuñcatha“iti mumukṣubhirheyatvavacanācceti sūtravṛttimabhipretya sūtraṃ vyācaṣṭe - tamiti /
GSP33bbdip11u:3449: sautranaño vyatyāsena anvayamabhipretya samucceyāntaramāha - asya viṣṇoraheyatveti /
GSP33bbdip11u:3454: tathā ca - ātmaśabdādīkṣatiśrutyukto 'pi nirguṇa eveti siddham/
GSP33bbdip11u:3463: sa devī bahudhā bhūtvā nirguṇaḥ puruṣottamaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3474: tattvapradīparītyā amuṣmādidaṃ saṅkhyāmātreṇodacyate ekameva bahusaṅkhyaṃ bhavati viśeṣādeveti vā /
GSP33bbdip11u:3511: gauṇa eva kiṃ na syādityastatra sautraṃ hetuṃ sāvadhāraṇasvaśabdāvṛttyā yojayati - svasyaiveti //
GSP33bbdip11u:3518: tathā ca pūrṇamiti śrutau svāpyayapadopalakṣitapūrṇatvasya vacanāt svasya svasminnevāpyayavacanācca,
GSP33bbdip11u:3519: sa iti spaṣṭaśrutāvapi ātmanyeva vilāpayīti svasya svasminnevāpyayavacanāt,
GSP33bbdip11u:3520: tasya ca nirguṇahariniṣṭhatāyāḥ smṛtau vacanācca ayaṃ nirguṇa eva na gauṇa iti yojanā /
GSP33bbdip11u:3521: vācyatve svāpyayasya sākṣāddhetutvābhāvāt sūtre bhāṣye ca caśabdābhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3523: tathāpyasya vācyatve sākṣadahetutvāttatra hetvantarasya jñāpakacaśabdo nānuvartanīyaḥ / na ca
GSP33bbdip11u:3524: śrutyuktatvāccetyadhyāhṛtahetau caśabdāvaśyaṃbhāvāt kathaṃ tadabhāva iti vācyam,
GSP33bbdip11u:3527: tathā cāyaṃ sūtrārthaḥ - na kevalaṃ nirguṇaviṣṇvākhyaṃ brahma īkṣaṇīyatvādvācyam,
GSP33bbdip11u:3535: yadyayaṃ svāpyayavān gauṇaḥ tarhyayaṃ nirguṇaścobhau pralaye 'nyatra layahīnau tiṣṭhataḥ?
GSP33bbdip11u:3537: nādyaḥ “idaṃ vā agne naiva kiñca nāsīt“(tai.brā. 2-2-9-1.)
GSP33bbdip11u:3542: tathā ca nirguṇasya saguṇe layo vācyaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3543: sa ca na sambhavatītyāha - na hīti /
GSP33bbdip11u:3549: tasmānnirguṇasya svasminneva layo vācya ityato 'yamananyalīno nirguṇa eveti tasyaiva śrutyuktatvādvācyatvaṃ siddhamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3551: na tu mukhyāsambhave gauṇāśrayaṇādityatreva nirguṇo 'yamityatreva vā mukhyārthaguṇahīnaviṣaya iti sūcanāya nirguṇasyeti vaktavyatve 'pi nirdeṣasyetyuktam / @#----------
GSP33bbdip11u:3556: sarve vedā yuktayaḥ supramāṇā brāhmaṃ jñānaṃ paramaṃ tvekameva /
GSP33bbdip11u:3557: prakāśayante na virodhaḥ kutaścidvedeṣu sarveṣu tathetihāse //
GSP33bbdip11u:3560: nanvastu nirguṇasya viṣṇorvācyatvopapattau satyāṃ kāraṇatvena śāstragamyatvam /
GSP33bbdip11u:3576: kuto netyatastatra hetutvena sūtramupanyasya vyācaṣṭe - gatīti /
GSP33bbdip11u:3577: uttarasūtrapadākarṣaṇena sarvādhikārisādhāraṇaṃ gatisāmānyasya śrutatvāditi yojanāmabhipretya asiddhiparihārāya tatsūtrasūcitāṃ śrutimāha - sarva iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:3581: suṣṭhu pramāṇaṃ pramāṇānantaraṃ mūlabhūtaṃ yāsāṃ tāḥ 'yuktayaḥ'; /
GSP33bbdip11u:3594: kaścidapi viṣayakṛto vā prakārakṛto vā 'virodho na';
GSP33bbdip11u:3601: “na hyekatra jñānānandādikamuktvānyatrājñānādirūpatvaṃ brahmaṇa ucyate“iti tattvapradīpokteḥ kathyata iti śeṣaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3602: na tu viṣamatvamiti vā svayameva sākṣānna tvanyamukheneti vā evaśabdārthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3604: iti śrutyā svayameva sākṣādgateḥ sarvaśākhotpādyajñānasya sāmānyāt ekavidhatvokteḥ na kāsucicchākhāsu anyathocyata iti sūtrārthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3605: atra bhinnaviṣayaprakārakeṣvapi jñāneṣu jñānatvena sāmyasattvātsāmyādityuktau viṣayaprakāraikyaṃ na siddhyatīti sāmānyāt samānatvāt ekavidhatvāt ityuktaṃ sūtre /
GSP33bbdip11u:3617: itaśca nirguṇaṃ brahma vācyamityāha sūtrakṛt - śrutatvācceti/
GSP33bbdip11u:3620: tathā ca tadviṣṇvākhyaṃ nirguṇaṃ na kevalamīkṣatyādibhiḥ nāśabdaṃ śabdavācyam /
GSP33bbdip11u:3622: svavācakanāmnā sākṣāduktatvāccetyartha ityāśayena sūtropāttaśrutiṃ paṭhati - eka iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:3627: ca deśataḥ kālato guṇataśca sarvaṃ vyāpnotītyarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3630: sarvaprāṇināṃ antaḥsthitvā ā samyak tanniyantā ca mātā ceti vā /
GSP33bbdip11u:3638: īkṣaṇaṃ ca na prākṛtaṃ kintu caitanyasvarūpamityāha - 'cetā';
GSP33bbdip11u:3640: 'kevalo'; jaḍāmiśraḥ samābhyadhikaśūnya iti vā “kevalaṃ tādṛśābhāvāt“iti dvitīyatātparyokteḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3646: “atra vācyatvaṃ pratipādayatsūtraṃ tadupāttaśrutyudāharaṇapūrvakaṃ paṭhati - eka iti“iti kvacitkaṭīkāpāṭhānusāreṇa bhāṣye kvacit śrutipāṭhānantaraṃ sūtrapāṭho dṛśyate /
GSP33bbdip11u:3648: śrutatve 'pyaśabdaḥ kiṃ na syādityaprayojakatvaśaṅkāyāmāha - na hīti /
GSP33bbdip11u:3654: nanu aśabdasyāpi brahmaṇo lakṣaṇayā śrutatvaṃ kiṃ na syādityata āha - na ceti /
GSP33bbdip11u:3657: kutaḥ? yato 'vācyasya vastuno lakṣyatvamaprasiddham ata iti vyāptiparatvenāpīdaṃ yojanīyam /
GSP33bbdip11u:3661: brahmaṇo lakṣaṇāyāḥ vedapadalakṣyatvasyāyukteḥ vipratipannaṃ na lakṣyaṃ,
GSP33bbdip11u:3663: tathā ca - nāsmābhiḥ kevalāvācyatvena lakṣyatvābhāvaḥ sādhyate yena tīrādau vyabhicāraḥ śaṅkayeta,
GSP33bbdip11u:3669: ato na vyabhicāra iti yuktivirodho duṣparihara iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3670: nanu lakṣyatvābhāvavati pravāhādau hetvabhāvādasādhāraṇamiti cet - na,
GSP33bbdip11u:3680: athādhyāyapādayorupodghātatvena pīṭharūpāyāmasyāṃ pañcādhikaraṇyaṃ brahmasvarūpanarūpaṇe anavaśeṣātkimadhyāyātmakaśeṣagranthenetyata āha - tameveti //
GSP33bbdip11u:3683: tathā ca - tathāpi prakaṭanaṃ vinādhyāyākhyaśeṣagranthasya kṛtyāntarābhāve 'pi 'tameva';
GSP33bbdip11u:3685: upakramādiliṅgajñāpyaṃ samyagvacanavṛttyā sarvaśāstrīyavacanānāṃ harau nirūpaṇaṃ tatparatvaṃ 'prakaṭayati';
GSP33bbdip11u:3686: prativākyagrahaṇena taddhetūpanyāsādinā prapañcayati “ānandamayo 'bhyāsāt“ityādinā anena prathamenādhyāyena sūtrakāra ityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3692: yathopakramādikaṃ tajjñāpyaṃ tātparyaṃ ca samanvayaśabdārthaḥ tathā bhāṣyaṃ yojitam adhastāt /
GSP33bbdip11u:3701: caturthapāde na samanvayaḥ kriyata iti paramatanirāsāya 'samastena';
GSP33bbdip11u:3712: prāyeṇānyatraprasiddhānāṃ śabdānāṃ paramātmani samanvayaḥ pradarśyate 'smin pāde /
GSP33bbdip11u:3715: tarhi adhyāyasyaikārthatvāt pādabhedaḥ kiṃ nibandhana ityataḥ samanvetavyabhedāt samanvaye 'pyavāntarabheda iti bhāvena prathamādhyāprathamapādapratipādyaṃ darśayati - prāyeṇeti //
GSP33bbdip11u:3719: śrutyādito lokato vādmapātato rūḍhatvena pratīyamānānāṃ nāmātmakānāṃ 'śabdānāṃ';
GSP33bbdip11u:3725: tattvapradīpe tu eka eva bhāṣye prāyeṇeti śabdaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3726: tasyaivottaratrāpi sambandha ityāśayena “prāyeṇānyatra prasiddhānāṃ śabdānāmiti ca sambandhaḥ“ityuktam /
GSP33bbdip11u:3727: tathā - ānandamayādhikaraṇe liṅgavicārattadapi prāyeṇeti vyāvartyamiti coktam /
GSP33bbdip11u:3728: yadvā - ṭīkāyāmapyāvṛttyabhiprāyeṇaikasyaiva punaruttaratrāpi anvayapradarśanāya pratīkagrahaṇaṃ kṛtamiti na granthavairūpyaṃ kalpyam /
GSP33bbdip11u:3729: ata eva tattvapradīpānusāreṇa “ānandamayanāmnaḥ iti ṭīkāyāmānandamayanāmaśbadaḥ ānandādināmaparo vā yojyaḥ“ityuktaṃ candrikāyām /
GSP33bbdip11u:3731: 'anyathā'; prathame spaṣṭabrahmaliṅgānāṃ śabdānāṃ dvitīyatṛtīyayoraspaṣṭabrahmaliṅgānāṃ samanvayaḥ pratipādyate /
GSP33bbdip11u:3733: caturthapāde tu pradhānasyāśābdatvoktirityevaṃ rūpo 'smaduktādanyaprakāreṇa pādārtho na vācyaḥ ityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3747: tathāpi ānandamayasya viṣṇutvasamarthane kā pūrvasaṅgatirityato 'vyavahitapūrvādhikaraṇenaiva saṅgatirvaktavyeti niyamābhāvāt
GSP33bbdip11u:3748: vyavahitapūrveṇa jijñāsādhikaraṇena tadviṣayeṇa ca asyānantaryalakṣaṇalakṣitāmākṣepikīṃ saṅgatiṃ tāvaddarśayati - brahmeti //
GSP33bbdip11u:3756: nanu brahmaṇo 'vayavatvoktāvapi kimarthamānandamayasya viṣṇutvasamarthanamityata āha - na hīti/
GSP33bbdip11u:3763: iti śrutau jijñāsyatayoktaṃ brahma ānandamayākhyasya kasyacidavayavarūpaṃ 'pratīyate';
GSP33bbdip11u:3772: ataḥ śaṅkārūpasaṅgatisadbhāvāt atrānandamayasya viṣṇvanyatvapakṣe brahmajijñāsākṣepāt viṣṇutvapakṣe ca tatsamādhānāt evaṃ ca pūrvapakṣasiddhāntayoḥ phalasadbhāvācca 'ato';
GSP33bbdip11u:3809: tadevānandamayākhyasya jīvaśarīrasya parairanyairupakartṛbhiḥ prāpyatvāt priyanāmakamupakārajanyavaiṣayikasukhākhyaṃ yacchiraḥ tatsthaṃ ca /
GSP33bbdip11u:3819: pratiṣṭhati gacchati loka ābhyāmiti vyutpattyā pratiṣṭhāpadokto yaḥ pādākhyo 'vayavaḥ tadbrahma 'brahmasṛṣṭyā tu bṛṃhayet';
GSP33bbdip11u:3820_1: sa evānandamayākhyajīvaśarīrasya yat pucchaṃ yaḥ pādākhyo 'vayavaḥ tatsthite brahmākhye
GSP33bbdip11u:3824: bhūtāḥ ye priyādayaḥ te viṣṇvabhinnāḥ ye cānandamayādijīvakośāvayavāḥ priyādayaste pratiśarīraṃ bhinnā iti dvividhāḥ priyādaya ityuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33bbdip11u:3825: yathoktaṃ candrikāyām - ye jīvābhimanyamānānandamayādikośāvayavāḥ priyādayaste pratiśarīraṃ bhinnāḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:3827_0: ye ca bhagavato 'vayavāḥ priyādayo na te pratiśarīraṃ bhinnā kintvabhinnā iti jīvasvarūpasyānandasya
GSP33bbdip11u:3829: ityudāhariṣyamāṇavacanaparyālocanayādmanandamayākhyo nārāyaṇaḥ punarnārāyaṇādirūpeṇa pañcadhā bhinnaḥ śiraḥprabhṛtyavayavātmanā tiṣṭhatīti pratīyate /
GSP33bbdip11u:3834: dehasthavāyusaṃsthaṃ ca brahma sṛṣṭyā tu bṛṃhayet // iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:3842: iti taittirīyachāndogyabhāṣyayoruktatvātparaprāpyasukhasāmānyavācakena prākṛtaṃ sukhaṃ grāhyamiti sūcitam“iti coktam /
GSP33bbdip11u:3847: eteṣu pañcasu dehākhyakośeṣu tattacchabdavācyāni puruṣākārāṇi aniruddhapradyumnasaṅkarṣaṇavāsudevanārāyaṇarūpāṇi dehadehibhāvena vartanta iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:3849: na hyavayavinaṃ vinā avayavamātrasya jñeyatetyata āha // -
GSP33bbdip11u:3855: evaṃ saṅgatiṃ phalaṃ coktvā viṣayasaṃśayau darśayati - ānandamaya iti //
GSP33bbdip11u:3870: brahmaśabdasya anyatrāpi vṛtteḥ kathaṃ tena caturmukhasyānandamayatvaniśca ityato yuktyantaramāha - śateti /
GSP33bbdip11u:3884: prāptirityasyānukarṣaṇārtho vā tathā ca - rudrasya cānandamayatvaprāptiḥ kutaḥ?
GSP33bbdip11u:3887: ityānandamayasya sūrye sthiteḥ uktatvādrudrasya ca sūryādyaṣṭaśarīratvādityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3888: tathā ca - rūdraliṅgasya ānandamaye śrutatvāt ānandamayo rudra evepi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3890: sūryo jalaṃ mahī vahnirvāyurākāśa eva ca /
GSP33bbdip11u:3910: ānandamaye śrutasya brahmaśabdasya 'mama yonirmahadbrahma tasmin garbhaṃ dadhāmyaham';
GSP33bbdip11u:3913: tathā ca mahat brahmaśabdavācyā lakṣmīḥ mama yoniḥ garbhādhānārthaṃ bhāryā /
GSP33bbdip11u:3914: tasmin brahmaṇi prakṛtau ahaṃ garbhaṃ dadhāmi dadha ityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3916: kathaṃ sāvakāśena brahmaśabdena prakṛterānandamayatvaniścaya ityato hetvantaramāha - 'bahubhāvāt';
GSP33bbdip11u:3937: kuto brahmaśabdasya jīvavācitvamityata uktam - bṛha jātīti /
GSP33bbdip11u:3952: ata eva tattvapradīpe - “brahmādiryasya devatāsaṅghasya“ityapi brahmādirityasya vigraho darśitaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3954: atha indrādīnāṃ “brahmā śivaḥ sureśādyāḥ“iti vacanoktakrameṇa kṣaradevoktyanantaramakṣarāyāḥ prakṛteruktiḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3965: tathāpi atra ye ānandamayaśabdenocyante na te hiraṇyagarbhādaya ityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3969: anenodāhṛtānandamaya iti sūtrapratijñābhāgasya saṅgatyarthamanvayārthaṃ samanvayasūtrodāhṛto vidheyasamarpakaḥ 'tattu';
GSP33bbdip11u:3971: kuta ānandamayo viṣṇurevetyataḥ pravṛttaṃ sautraṃ hetuṃ vyācaṣṭe - tadeveti /
GSP33bbdip11u:3972: ityādiṣu vākyeṣu tasminviṣṇāveva prasiddhasya mukhyārthatvenoktasya brahmaśabdasya tasminnānandamaye ānandamayaṃ pratyudāhṛte 'asanneva';
GSP33bbdip11u:3976: aprayojakatvaśaṅkāvāraṇāya brahmaśabdasyānyatra niravakāśatvajñāpanāya tasmin prasiddheti eveti coktam/
GSP33bbdip11u:4005: ityādau brahmaśabdasteṣu kathamiṣyata ityata āha - kvacidanyatreṣṭo 'pi brahmaśabdaḥ 'upacāreṇa';
GSP33bbdip11u:4009: madhye ātmapadopetasādhāraṇasmṛtyupādānanimittaṃ tu abhyāsādityasya 'anyontara ātmā'; (tai. u. 2-2-1.)
GSP33bbdip11u:4010: ityādau brahmavācakātmaśabdābhyāsādityapyartho varṇanīya iti jñāpanamityuktaṃ candrikāyām /
GSP33bbdip11u:4012: iti vyāsasmṛtivākyaṃ tu 'buddhyāvihiṃsan puṣpairvā praṇavena samarcayet';
GSP33bbdip11u:4014: atra hi vāsudevātmakaṃ brahmetyāderbhagavān brahmeti pratīyate iti nyāyadīpokteḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4017: manasā samarcayedityanena yatīnāṃ mānasapūjocyate puṣpādyairvā samarcayet ityanena kāyikapūjā /
GSP33bbdip11u:4023: aṣṭākṣareṇa vā samarcayedityanena vācikapūjocyate iti jñātavyam / @#----------
GSP33bbdip11u:4026: vikāraśabdān neti cen na prācuryāt / BBs_1,1.13 /
GSP33bbdip11u:4055: kuta ityataḥ pravṛttaṃ sautraṃ hetuṃ vyācaṣṭe - pracureti /
GSP33bbdip11u:4063_1: mayaḍityākhyapratyayasya prācuryārthatvaṃ ca 'tādātmyārthe vikārārthe prācuryārthe mayaṭ tridhā';
GSP33bbdip11u:4065_1: tadanukūlatayā ānandaḥ pracuro yasmin sa ānandapracuraḥ iti samāsaḥ kāryo na tadviparītaḥ
GSP33bbdip11u:4066: tathāpyāndamaya iti taddhitavṛttyananuguṇānandapracuraiti samāsavākyābhidhāne brāhmaṇapracuro grāma itivat ānānandasyāpi prāptestadvāraṇāya pracurānanda iti viparītasamāsaḥ kṛtaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4069: tathāpi uktaprayojanābhiprāyeṇa pracurānandatvāditi sautravyāsavākyaviparītasamāsaḥ kṛta ityāhuḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4071: yadyapyānandamaya iti śrutisūtrānusāreṇa prācuryasya viśeṣyatvenoktāvapi nānānandaprāptiḥṣa prākāśapracuro ravirityukte 'pi savitaryandhakāraleśāpratīteḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4074_0: tathāpi prācuryasya viśeṣaṇatāyāmanānandāprāpteḥ parairapi svīkṛtatvāt viśeṣyatāyāṃ
GSP33bbdip11u:4074_1: tu tasya samānādhikaraṇavijātīyālpatvanirūpyatvāt brāhmaṇapracuro grāma ityādāviva
GSP33bbdip11u:4097: auṣadhijanitānnaprācuryasya annopajīviṣu pārthivaśarīreṣu sambhave 'pi aprākṛtavigrahe harau asambhavāt /
GSP33bbdip11u:4107: na cālpārthatvena māhātmyarūpatvābhāvātsa kathaṃ harau yujyata iti vācyam /
GSP33bbdip11u:4129: tathā ca sudhoktarītyā gauṇyā vṛttyā upajīvyatvamevādyatvaṃ vivakṣitaṃ,
GSP33bbdip11u:4146: iti ya eva puruṣaḥ so 'nnarasamaya iti annavikārapuruṣaparāmarśādanuvādāt /
GSP33bbdip11u:4147: anyathā tadvirodhaḥ syādityata āha - sa iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:4149: tathāceti vākyena yasmādātmanaḥ ākāśādikamutpannaṃ sa eṣa puruṣa iti 'anyasya';
GSP33bbdip11u:4153: kimarthamasau parāmṛśyate ityāśaṅkāpanodanāya parāmarśāditi vaktavye prārambhādityāha /
GSP33bbdip11u:4157: 'sa vā'; iti śrutau vaiśabdo 'vadhāraṇe prasiddhau vā /
GSP33bbdip11u:4167: rūpasyānnamayaśarīrasya yataḥ sārabhūto viṣṇuḥ ato 'nnarasamayaḥ“iti annaśabdasyāvṛttyā rasaśabdasya kramavyatyāsena ca vyākhyātam / @#----------
GSP33bbdip11u:4173: nanvevaṃ mayaṭchabdasyobhayārthe prayogādatrāpyubhayapakṣe doṣadarśanātpañcānāṃ mayaṭāṃ prācuryamevārtho na vikāritvamityatra kiṃ niyāmakam?
GSP33bbdip11u:4175: ityādiśrutivirodhaḥ syāt ityata āha - ye 'nnaṃ brahmeti //
GSP33bbdip11u:4185: evaṃ pradarśite hetudvaye 'dhyāhṛtahetudvārānvayayogye krameṇa sādhye āha - na vikāritvamiti /
GSP33bbdip11u:4191: brahmaśabdaśravaṇādanyathāsiddhatatsamabhivyāhārāt ubhayathāpi sambhavatāṃ mayaṭāṃ prācuryamevārthaḥ na vikāritvamiti niścīyate /
GSP33bbdip11u:4210: tataścānnamayādīnāṃ madhye ekasyaiva brahmatvakalpanā ca na yuktaiva,
GSP33bbdip11u:4213: sa tu sūtrakāreṇaiva pūrvapakṣīkṛta iti na tatpakṣaṃ pratyākṣipadbhāṣyakāraḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4214: tattvapradīpe tu - na ceti vākyaṃ na ca māyinā pṛthakkalpanā 'satyaṃ jñānamanantaṃ brahma'; (tai.u. 2-1-1.)
GSP33bbdip11u:4217: annamayādayaḥ pañcakośā mitho bhinnāḥ teṣāṃ brahmaśabdoktatve 'pi abrahmatvam/
GSP33bbdip11u:4225: ityādiko vākyaśeṣaḥ saguṇavākyaikavākyatāpannaḥ tatphalapratipādaka ityādikā yuktā /
GSP33bbdip11u:4228: bhāṣyakāraḥ savistaraṃ viśiṣya na nirācakhyāviti ṭīkābhiprāyābhyupagamāt /
GSP33bbdip11u:4232: ityādau bhedasthala eva tathā prayogādityata āha - svarūpe ceti /
GSP33bbdip11u:4238: tathā ca prakāśasvarūpe 'pi sūryabimbe viśeṣabalāt 'pracuraprakāśo raviritivat';
GSP33bbdip11u:4239: evaṃrūpavyavahāravat ānandādisvarūpe 'pi harau viśeṣeṇa tathā vyavahāro yujyata eveti na tadanupapattirityarthaḥ / @#----------
GSP33bbdip11u:4244: yadeṣa ākāśa ānando na syāt'; (tai. 2-7.) iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:4247: hetvantararūpaṃ prācuryameva mayaḍartha ityatra ca hetuṃ pratipādayatsūtramupanyasyati - taddhetviti //
GSP33bbdip11u:4253_0: tasminnānandamayaprakaraṇe tasya viṣṇoḥ tasmin anandapūrṇatvenānandamayatve prācuryasyaiva
GSP33bbdip11u:4253_2: viṣṇureveti sūtravṛttimabhipretya tameva hetuvyapadeśaṃ darśayati - kohīti /
GSP33bbdip11u:4255: āsamantātprakāśamāno viṣṇurānandaḥ pūrṇānando na syāt tadāsau lokaṃ na pravartayediti śeṣaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4264: sudhāyāṃ tu ṇyarthānandarbhāvena na ko 'pi lokikīṃ vaidikīṃ pravṛttiṃ kuryāditi vyākhyātam /
GSP33bbdip11u:4275_0: tasya parabrahmaṇi mukhyatve 'pi viṣṇoḥ ānandamayāvayavatvoktyādinā bādhakenāmukhyārthasyaiva
GSP33bbdip11u:4286: kuto 'nnamayādiśabdairmantravarṇalakṣitasyaiva pratipādanaṃ jñāyata ityata uktam - śabdānusandhānāditi /
GSP33bbdip11u:4287: 'śabdānāṃ'; satyaṃ jñānamanantam ityevaṃrūpāṇām annamayādiśabdānāṃ ca arthānusandhānāt jātāt 'anusandhānāt'
GSP33bbdip11u:4289: mantravarṇe 'pi brahmetyevoktatvātkathaṃ tadarthānāmapyannamayādiśabdānāṃ parabrahmārthatājñaptirityata āha - brahmaviditi /
GSP33bbdip11u:4293: parabrahmatajjñānatatprāptīḥ sūcayitvā saṅkṣepeṇaktvā tatra prāptaśaṅkāpanodāya pravṛtto mantravarṇaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4298: tathā ca na kevalaṃ brahmaśabdādevānandamayādiviṣṇvākhyaṃ parabrahmaiva nāparabrahmetyavasīyate /
GSP33bbdip11u:4300: iti vedavākyena lakṣaṇavattayā proktaṃ paraṃ brahamaivānnamayādiśabdaiḥ 'gīyate';
GSP33bbdip11u:4305: parabrahmaprāptikāmaḥ parabrahma jānīyāt iti śruteḥ phalito 'rthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4309: paramātmānantaḥ pūrṇānandatvādityānandamayaśabdenopapādyata iti satyādiśabdānāṃ annamayādiśabdānāṃ cakārthatvam anusandheyam /
GSP33bbdip11u:4328: avayavatve ca avayavitvasya virodho 'pi neti caśabdārthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4329: kuta ityato 'vayavina evāvayavatvasyāvayavitvasya ca śrutyuktatvenāvayavyāderavayavādyabhedādityāśayena tāṃ śrutimudāharati - sa iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:4340: kintu - bhāṣye upalakṣaṇayā gṛhītā 'padaṃ pucchaṃ pratiṣṭhā vai puruṣaḥ';
GSP33bbdip11u:4345: śiro nārāyaṇaḥ pakṣo dakṣiṇassavya eva ca /
GSP33bbdip11u:4348: pucchaṃ saṅkarṣaṇaḥ proktaḥ eka eva tu pañcadhā //
GSP33bbdip11u:4354: avayavina avayavatvaṃ viruddhamityāśaṅkāṃ śrutyā parihṛtyātra smṛtiṃ cāha - śira iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:4355: atra citrādau likhyamānanavanārīrūpe avayavibhūtānāmanekastrīṇāmekadehāvayavatvaṃ tathā nārāyaṇādipañcarūpāṇāṃ ekāvayavatvamucyate/
GSP33bbdip11u:4366: asmin pakṣe tu - tadaṃśe vaiparītyamityupāsanābhedena pakṣabhedoktiḥ/
GSP33bbdip11u:4373: pañcadhā vibhaktaḥ eka evāyavaiḥ abhinna eva na tu bhinnaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4375: avayavitvena prakāreṇa tadbhāvaṃ prāptaḥ krīḍata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4377: nanvastavevaṃ tāvatā na virodhaparihāro jāta ityata āha - aiśvaryāditi /
GSP33bbdip11u:4388: evaṃ na virodha ityetat avayavāvayavinorabhede 'yamavayavī ayam avayava iti bhedavyavahāravirodho 'pi netyapi vyākhyeyam /
GSP33bbdip11u:4400: kiñca - loke parimitaśaktitva eva virodhadarśanāt viṣṇorvirodhopayogiparimitaśaktiśūnyatvāt tarkyatvāṅgīkāre 'pi na virodha
GSP33bbdip11u:4405: tathā ca paroktatarkasya sopādhikatvenāpramāṇatvānna virodhitvamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4415: nanu yaduktaṃ sa vā iti vākye 'sya paramātmana eva parāmarśaḥ na annātpuruṣaḥ ityuktadehasyeti tadayuktam;
GSP33bbdip11u:4416: ātmano dūrasthatvāddehasya sa samāpasthatvātsamīpoktaparityāgena dūrasthaparāmarśāṅgīkāre kāraṇābhāvāt /
GSP33bbdip11u:4417: kiñca - puruṣapadena prakṛtasyaiva puruṣapadenoktatvāt ātmanaśca tena aprakṛtatvātpuruṣapadena parāmarśāyogaḥ / na ca -
GSP33bbdip11u:4419: puruṣaḥ prakṛtistho hi bhuṅkte prakṛtijān guṇān //
GSP33bbdip11u:4420: iti vākyadvayasthapuruṣapadena ekavidhenaiva vyavasthāyā paramātmajīvayoruktigrahaṇavadihāpi ekavidhenaiva dviruktena puruṣapadena vyavasthayārthadvayoktyaṅgīkāro 'stviti vācyam /
GSP33bbdip11u:4422: sa vā ityatra ca paramātmaivocyata iti vyavasthāṅgīkārāyogādityata āha - raseti //
GSP33bbdip11u:4427: tathā ca sa vā iti vākyena cideva cinmātraṃ brahmacaitanyameva ucyate parāmṛśyate na dehaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4431: ityākāśādipuruṣāntaśabdairuktaṃ tattatsārabhūtam ākāśādipadārthaśreṣṭhabhūtaṃ cinmātraṃ brahmaiva sa vā iti parāmarśavākyenocyate /
GSP33bbdip11u:4432: evaṃ tarhi puruṣapadena dvayorapi prakṛtatvādubhayaparāmarśo 'yamastviti na ca vācyam /
GSP33bbdip11u:4433: yataḥ tatsārabhūtaṃ puruṣasārabhūtaṃ cinmātraṃ brahmaivānyadehādikaṃ vihāya saḥ iti parāmarśavākyenocyate /
GSP33bbdip11u:4437: rasaśabdena rasaśabdārthena mukhyatvena viśeṣaṇāt viśeṣitatvāt annatvarūpaviśeṣaṇasyeti vā /
GSP33bbdip11u:4442: kintu, tattatsārabhūtaṃ tattatkośaniyāmakaṃ tadgataṃ brahmacaitanyameva ucyate /
GSP33bbdip11u:4444: ityādau raso vai saḥ ityante cānnamayādīnāṃ kośavyāvṛttyarthaṃ tadbhedārthameva rasaśabdena viśeṣaṇāt viśeṣitatvādityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4450: kintu brahmaiva tasyaiva ca saḥ ityādau parāmarśaḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:4453: na ca vācyam upaniṣaddraṣṭā munirbrahmāparokṣīkṛtya pratyakṣato nirdiśatīti /
GSP33bbdip11u:4455: kiñca - svasyāparokṣato jñātatvena śabdānapekṣaṇāt upadeśyapuruṣāṇāṃ cāparokṣāyogyatvānnirdeśavaiyarthyamityata tadasyetyapi vyākhyeyam /
GSP33bbdip11u:4456_2: lakṣaṇayā brahmaśirasi idamiti nirdeśo yujyata iti yojanā /
GSP33bbdip11u:4458: tathā ca vastraprāvṛte varmāntargate vā jānunīdaṃ jānviti vyavahāravadayamapi vyavahāro yujyata eveti na tadvirodha iti bhāvaḥ / @#----------
GSP33bbdip11u:4469: iti śrutivirodhaḥ ityapyayuktamapramitatvādityata āha - ananya iti //
GSP33bbdip11u:4474: abhinno 'pi anyo bhinna iti śabdena procyata /
GSP33bbdip11u:4484: brahmāṇḍe purāṇe ityanantaram uktatvānna virodha ityanvayaḥ/ @#----------
GSP33bbdip11u:4494_0: nanu brahmaśabdasya sādhāraṇatvāt taddhetuvyapadeśasya viṣṇuniṣṭhatayā spaṣṭapratibhānāt
GSP33bbdip11u:4494_2: cābhāvādānandamayādayo viriñcādaya eva santviti śaṅkāṃ pariharatsūtramavatārayati - na ceti //
GSP33bbdip11u:4503: kuto neti hetvākāṅkṣāyāṃ sūtramupanyasya pratijñāṃśasya na cetyādibhāṣyeṇaiva vyākhyātatvātsautramananyathāsiddhahetumeva vyācaṣṭe - netara iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:4509: asya hetuvākyasya adhyāhṛtahetuvākyadvārā na ceti pratijñayānvayaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4517: viṣṇujñānādeva mokṣo netarajñānādityetatkuta ityata āha - tamiti /
GSP33bbdip11u:4519: iti śrutyā mokṣasya viṣṇujñānādanya upāyo nāstītyuktam /
GSP33bbdip11u:4531: hetvantareṇa brahmādīnāmānandamayatvaṃ parākurvatsūtraṃ paṭhitvā vyācaṣṭe - bhedeti /
GSP33bbdip11u:4532: atra pūrvahetusamuccāyakena caśabdenānandamayādirnetara iti pratijñāvākyānuvṛtterapi sūcanāt /
GSP33bbdip11u:4533: tadvihāya sūtroktaṃ bhedavyapadeśaṃ darśayati - te ye śatamiti //
GSP33bbdip11u:4556: iti apakṛṣṭotkṛṣṭasarvajīsthitirūpabhedakadharmokteḥ jīvasamudāyasya cānevaṃvidhatvāditi sūtrārtha ukto bhavati /
GSP33bbdip11u:4564: ātmanaḥ ime ātmyāḥ jīvagīṇāḥ na vidyante ātmyāḥ yasmin so 'nātmyaḥ tasmin jīvaguṇavidhure /
GSP33bbdip11u:4565: athavā - ātmanaḥ svāmino 'yamātmyaḥ svāmisambandhī sa netyanātmyaḥ tasmin,
GSP33bbdip11u:4593: tathāpi tena kathaṃ brahmādīnāṃ bhedaḥ sambhavati /
GSP33bbdip11u:4609: kuto netyatastatraitacchrutīnāṃ parabrahmārthakatvena advaitārthatvābhāvāditi hetūpaskāramabhipretya teṣāṃ parabrahmārthatve pramāṇamāha - nāmānīti /
GSP33bbdip11u:4612: tathā ca padasamanvayenaiteṣāṃ brahmaparatvānnaitadvirodha iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4628: idaṃ hi viśvaṃ bhagavānivetaro yato jagatsthānanirodhasambhavaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4633: bhagavataḥ sarvaikyaśruteḥ sarvasvāmitvanimittaikyaparatvādityāśayena tatra pramāṇatvena bhāgavatasmṛtiṃ paṭhati - idaṃ hīti //
GSP33bbdip11u:4642: jagataḥ sthānaṃ sthitiḥ nirodho nāśaḥ sambhavaḥ utpattiḥ te yasmādbhavanti sa tathoktaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4644: athavā - tiṣṭhatyasmāt niruddhyate pralīyate 'smin sambhāvayatīti sa tathoktaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4646: evambhūtsya jagadbhedaḥ pramāṇasiddha iti jñāpanāya hiśabdaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4647: tattvapradīpe tu - bahuvrīhiṃ vinā idaṃ viśvaṃ bhagavāniva;
GSP33bbdip11u:4655: bhagavān sarvabhinno 'pi sarvasvāmitvāt sarva ityabhedena vedādiṣūcyate ityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4664: nanu bhedajñānasya mithyājñānatvātkathaṃ tadanusāreṇaikyaśrutayo yojyanta ityāśaṅkāṃ bhāgavatavākyena pariharati - vidyeti //
GSP33bbdip11u:4665: idaṃ ca kā vidyetyuddhavapraśnasyottaratvena kṛṣṇenoktaṃ vacanamekādaśaskandhe /
GSP33bbdip11u:4669: na ca bhidāyā abodha iti vyākhyeyam,
GSP33bbdip11u:4671: nanu bhedajñānasya puruṣārthahetutvāt kathaṃ tasya vidyātvamityata āha - bhedeti /
GSP33bbdip11u:4685: abhito harermānena parameśvare bahumānena āgraheṇa ca 'niḥsaṅgena karmaṇāpi';
GSP33bbdip11u:4706: tattvapradīpe tu - abhimāneneti padaṃ abhito mānena viśeṣajñāneneti vyākhyāya,
GSP33bbdip11u:4714: guṇānāṃ sattvādīnāṃ vyatikare vaiṣamye jāte sati yathāpūrvaṃ jñānādiguṇatāratamyaṃ parasparabhedaṃ ca avihāya tadviśiṣṭa eva 'prajāyate';
GSP33bbdip11u:4728: ata eva anyaṃ jīvādbhinnaṃ viṣṇum iti tadetatsatyam (mu. 2-1-1-.)
GSP33bbdip11u:4729: ityādinā prāguktaprakāreṇa asya mahimānaṃ ca yadā paśyati /
GSP33bbdip11u:4730: paśyo jīvaḥ tadā vītaśoko mukto bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4731: tattvapradīpe tu - juṣṭaṃ devaiḥ asya jīvasya īśam anyaṃ yadā paśyati mahimānaṃ mahimaguṇātmakaṃ tadā tadaiva vītaśoko bhavati na duḥkhaleśamapi spṛśati jīvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4732: na tu mahimaguṇavihīnam anyamanīśamasevitaṃ paśyan vītaśoko bhavatīti vyākhyātam /
GSP33bbdip11u:4734: ityatra ayamanyomārga ityukte prasiddhamārgādanyatvabodhavat anyamīśamityukte īśaśabditasya brahmaṇaḥ prasiddheśādrudrāt anyatvapratīterbrahmaṇo rudrādanyatve pramāṇatvenoktā /
GSP33bbdip11u:4742: 'asarvaḥ sarva ivātmaiva sannanātmeva pratyaṅparāṅivaika īyate bahudheyate'
GSP33bbdip11u:4745: evaṃ svāmitvārthatayā parābhimatādvaitaśrutīrvyākhyāya vākyasamanvayāśrayaṇena antaryāmitayāpi tāḥ śrutismṛtibhyāṃ vyācaṣṭe - asarva iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:4746: yadyapi asarvaḥ iti vākyam ātmaśabdasya svāmitvārthatvamupetya svāmitvena nimittenaikyaśrutayaḥ pravṛttā ityatra pramāṇatayodāhṛtam /
GSP33bbdip11u:4747: tathāpi svāmitvenevāntaryāmitayāpyaikyaśrutayaḥ pravṛttā ityubhayatrāpyasya pramāṇatvasambhavādubhayatrāpi pramāṇatayodāharaṇaṃ yuktam /
GSP33bbdip11u:4748: tattvapradīpakṛtāmapi svāmitvenevāntaryāmitayāpyaikyaśrutayaḥ pravṛttā ityubhayatrāpi asarvaḥ iti śrutiḥ pramāṇamityabhiprāyaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4749: na caivaṃ tattadantaryāmitvenāpi tattacchabdavācyatvaṃ viṣṇorastītyāha - sarvāntaryāmikaḥ iti tattvapradīpavirodhaḥ;
GSP33bbdip11u:4751: antaryāmitvenāpītyuktyā na kevalaṃ nāmāni iti śrutibalāttattacchabdapravṛttinimittatvena tattacchabdavācyatvaṃ viṣṇoḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:4752: api tu antaryāmitvenāpītyetāvanmātrapratīteḥ atra padasamanvaye tātparyānavagamāt /
GSP33bbdip11u:4753: mahāvākyagatasyaitadādiśabdasyaikaikasya sarvāntaryāmikaḥ iti smṛtibalāt antaryāmitvanimittena viṣṇuvācitve 'pi padāntarāṇānyaparatvena vākyasamanvayasyaiva vaktavyatvāt /
GSP33bbdip11u:4754: yadā nāmāni iti śrutibalāt kriyākārakādisarvārthavācisarvapadasya viṣṇuvācitvābhyupagamaḥ tadaiva padasamanvayaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4755: na tvekaikasya viṣṇuvācitva iti na virodhaḥ tathā cāntaryāmitvanimittena tattvamasyādivākyagatatvamahamādipadānāṃ viṣṇuvācitve tvaṃ tvadantaryāmī tat brahma /
GSP33bbdip11u:4757: na caivami asi asmi iti kriyāpadānvayāyogaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4760: yadyapi nimittakathanaprakaraṇe vidyātmani bhedadṛṣṭyā juṣṭaṃ yadā iti vākyatrayasyānvayābhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4761: tathāpi svāmitvanimittenaikyavyapadeśa ityatra śrutismṛtyorupanyāne sati tatra prāptaśaṅkāparihārasyāvaśyakatvenāvasarasaṅgatyā tadvākyatrayapravṛtteḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4762: ityādeḥ ityasāyatrākarṣaṇena na virodhaḥ ityasyānukarṣaṇena cānvayo draṣṭavyaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4763: śrutyarthastu - viṣṇuḥ asarvo 'pi sarvanātmako 'pi sarva iva sarvātmaka iva sarvātmakatvena īyate /
GSP33bbdip11u:4764: kuta ityatastatrāntaryāmitvaṃ hetutvenābhipretya anantaryāmitvapratītyā tasyāsiddhimāśaṅkyāha - ātmaiveti /
GSP33bbdip11u:4765: ātmaiva antaryāmyeva san anātmeva anantaryāmitvena īyate jñāyate rāmakṛṣṇādirūpeṣu /
GSP33bbdip11u:4771: nanu viṣṇau viruddhānekadharmābhyupagame bhedāpattyā ekameva iti śrutivirodha ityata āha - eka iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:4775: tattvapradīpe tu - pratyaṅ parāṅiva abhimukho 'pyanabhimukha iva eka eva bahudheyate jñāyate prāpyate ca ityuktam /
GSP33bbdip11u:4785: saḥ sarvātmakatvena vyapadiśyamāno bhagavān brahma sarvatra pūrṇatvādbrahmasaṃjña ityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4786: nanvanyatrādṛṣṭamantargatasya bahirgatatvādikaṃ kathaṃ ghaṭata ityata āha - sa īśvara iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:4787: saḥ hariḥ yataḥ īśvaraḥ acintyaśaktyupetaḥ atastasmin anyatrāghaṭitamapi sarvaṃ ghaṭata iti // @#----------
GSP33bbdip11u:4791: eṣo 'haṃ tvamasau ceti na tu sarvasvarūpataḥ //
GSP33bbdip11u:4796: yadvā - yāmo niyamanaṃ tatra bhava ityarthe ṭhak,
GSP33bbdip11u:4797: yato viṣṇuḥ sarvāntaryāmikaḥ sarvāntarniyāmakaḥ ata eva eṣa ātmeti hovāca (chā. 8-3-4.)
GSP33bbdip11u:4801: iti vākyasthena eṣo 'haṃtvamasāviti sarvanāmnā sarvavācakasarvanāmasaṃṅakaśabdena sarvamiti nāmnā cābhidhīyate /
GSP33bbdip11u:4804: mokṣadharme hi vaiśampāyanaṃ prati he brahman bhedavākyāt bahavaḥ puruṣāḥ pratipattavyāḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4808: tathā - puruṣabāhulyamupetyaikyavākyasya śreṣṭhaparatvapakṣe 'pi ātmasu kiṃ sarve samāḥ?
GSP33bbdip11u:4812: taṃ tathā ca bhavān vaktumarhatītyāśayena kṛtasya janamejayapraśnasya vaiśampāyanenoktamuttaram -
GSP33bbdip11u:4818: tathā ca vedāḥ ekameva puruṣaṃ vadantītyetanmataṃ jñānino necchantītyarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4819: yadvā - etasmin jagati ekaṃ puruṣaṃ necchanti,
GSP33bbdip11u:4827_0: he kurukulodvaha eteṣāṃ bahūnāṃ puruṣāṇām ātmānāṃ madhye yā yoniḥ yaḥ kāraṇabhūtaḥ
GSP33bbdip11u:4827_1: ekā śreṣṭhaḥ yathā ca śreṣṭha ucyate śrutyādau tathā tena prakāreṇa taṃ viśvaṃ pūrṇaṃ
GSP33bbdip11u:4827_2: guṇādhikaṃ puruṣam ākhyāsyāmi vyākhyāsyāmīti prameyadīpikāvyāsatīrthīyadiśā smṛtyarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4829: tathā ca sarvotkṛṣṭaṃ yadekaṃ brahmatattvamasi tasmādatyavaro 'si atyavaro 'smīti śrutyartha ukto bhavati /
GSP33bbdip11u:4830: ityādeśca ityasya na ca tattvamasītyādivirodhaḥ ityanenānvayaḥ / @#----------
GSP33bbdip11u:4840: aprāptasya ca pratiṣedhāyogāt ityata āha - uktā ceti //
GSP33bbdip11u:4842: co yato na ca tattvamasi ityādinā jīveśvaikyasya prāptiḥ śrutyarthāparijñānanimittā prasaktiruktā /
GSP33bbdip11u:4844: nanvetacchrutīnāmavirodhakatve 'pi bhedaśruteḥ brahmaiva san brahmāpyeti iti śrutivirodhastu bhaviṣyati /
GSP33bbdip11u:4845: atra brahmaiveteyavakāreṇa jīvasyābrahmatāniṣedhena tadadhīnatvādinā nimittena abrahmabhūte brahmatvavyavahāra ityuktagaterasambhavādityata āha - brahmaiveti /
GSP33bbdip11u:4851: tathā ca yato brahmaiva san iti vākye śruto 'yamādyo brahmaśabdaḥ brahmāṇi jīvāḥ sarve 'pi iti śruterjīva eva,
GSP33bbdip11u:4854: tathā ca iti vākye śrutādyabrahmaśabdokto jīva eva,
GSP33bbdip11u:4856: tathā ca iti vākye śrutādyabrahmaśabdokto jīva eva,
GSP33bbdip11u:4858: tathā ca saḥ muktajīvo brahmaiva san jīva eva san jīvabhāvamavihāyaiva pralaye parabrahmāpnoti /
GSP33bbdip11u:4859: apihitassan praviśatīti śrutyarthopapatteḥ noktabhedavyapadeśasyaitacchrutivarodha iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4862: prāpnoti paramaṃ brahma pralaye pralaye sadā / iti //
GSP33bbdip11u:4868: nanu brahmaśabdasya parabrahmaṇyeva mukhyatvānna jīve 'sau yujyata ityata āha - upapadyata iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:4870: tathā ca brahmaśabdo yadyapi parabrahmaṇi mukhyaḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:4871: tathāpi virodhe svīyapūrvottaravākyavirodhe prāmāṇāntaravirodhe vā sati jīve 'pyupapadyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4872: prakṛte ca brahmāpyeti ityuttarabhāvisvavākyena paramaṃ sāmyam iti pūrvavākyena bhedagrāhipratyakṣādinā ca virodho 'stīti bhāvaḥ / @#----------
GSP33bbdip11u:4879: atra saṃsāre 'pi jīvasya muktatvoktyā tadanyathānupapattyā parabrahmatvāvagamāt ityata āha - pramādeti //
GSP33bbdip11u:4881: tathā ca api - jīvasya parabrahmatvābhāve 'pi vimuktatvaṃ vimuktatvavacanaṃ ca yujyate /
GSP33bbdip11u:4882: na kevalaṃ brahmaśabda upapadyate iti cārthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4892: he kṣatriyādya mṛtyuḥ saṃsāra tadabhāvarūpāmṛtatvaṃ cetyubhe api satye eva pravṛtte /
GSP33bbdip11u:4894: tarhi mithyā syādityato netyāha - pramādaṃ vā iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:4895: ahaṃ mṛtyuṃ saṃsāraṃ pramādaṃ asvābhāvikaṃ bravīmi /
GSP33bbdip11u:4896: amṛtatvaṃ muktatvaṃ tu apramādāt pramādāpāyāt bravīmītyarthaḥ / @#----------
GSP33bbdip11u:4912: nanu bhedokteḥ śrutivirodhābhāve 'pi jīvo brahmābhinnaḥ cetanatvāt brahmavat /
GSP33bbdip11u:4918: kintu tasyāḥ bhedokteḥ tenādvaitaparikalpitānumānena virodho 'pi netyarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4935: yatheccham īśvaro na svatantraḥ cetanatvāt devadattavat /
GSP33bbdip11u:4936: jaḍa ātmā vastutvādityādirūpeṇa na tattve atattve 'pi anumātuṃ śakyate /
GSP33bbdip11u:4937: ataḥ anena pratyakṣādiviruddhasyāpi pramāṇatve cetanatvavastutvāderapi pramāṇatvaṃ syāt aviśeṣāditi vipakṣe bādhakatarka ukto bhavati /
GSP33bbdip11u:4939: ityekadeśotkīrtanena yathākāmāditi samagraśabdo lakṣyate jyotiśśabdena jyotiṣṭomaśabdavat ityāśayena yathākāmamityuktam /
GSP33bbdip11u:4949: smṛtyanusāreṇa sūtre bhāṣye ca tattvajñānāsādhanatvaprakaṭanāya parābhimatānumāne sādhanagocarecchāviṣayatvaniṣedhaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4953: na apekṣā yasyāṃ sā tathāktā tattvajñānakāraṇaṃ na bhavati /
GSP33bbdip11u:4956: tadviruddhāpi sadanumā kiṃ na syāt? na syāt /
GSP33bbdip11u:4959: tathā ca pratyakṣādiviruddhāyā api prāmāṇye uktarītyā atattvaviṣaye pravṛttāyā anumāyā api prāmāṇyaṃ syāt,
GSP33bbdip11u:4978: apavṛttaṃ viruddhaṃ gaṃ gamanaṃ yasyāḥ sā apagā,
GSP33bbdip11u:4991: kutaḥ? yat sā anumā kevalānumā yathākāmā tasmāditi yojyam /
GSP33bbdip11u:5004: spaṣṭoktitvātprathamaṃ smṛtimupanyasyātraiva arthe śrutisammatiṃ cāha - naiṣeti /
GSP33bbdip11u:5020: tathā ca iti kaṭhaśrutau coktamiti sambandhaḥ / @#----------
GSP33bbdip11u:5023: asminn asya ca tadyogaṃ śāsti / BBs_1,1.19 /
GSP33bbdip11u:5036: asyānyasya ceti pratītinirāsāya caśabdaṃ vyākhyāti yuktīti /
GSP33bbdip11u:5043: anena na kevalaṃ bhedavyapadeśādānandamayena jīvānāṃ bhedaḥ siddhaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:5044: kiṃ nāma? yato 'smin prakaraṇe asya jīvasyānenānandamayena saha 'asmiṃśca';
GSP33bbdip11u:5047: ato na tadaikyaṃ jīvānāṃ nāpi sāṃsārika eva bhedaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:5055: tasmādānandamayo na jīvakośādiriti sūtrārtha ukto bhavati /
GSP33bbdip11u:5081_1: kriyata iti śāstrādhyāyapādasaṅgatayaḥ siddhā ityāśayena pūrvādhikaraṇatadviṣayavākyasaṅgatī
GSP33bbdip11u:5090: hṛdayaguhāntaḥpraviṣṭaṃ jagatkartāraṃ candramasyantarmanasā svecchayā carantaṃ sahaiva sthitam etaṃ devāstattvābhimāninaḥ kārtsnyena na vijānantīti śrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:5097: 'indro rājā'; ityādivākyairyato 'nyo 'ntaḥsthatayā pratīyate ata iti yojanā /
GSP33bbdip11u:5101: brahmendramagniṃ jagataḥ pratiṣṭhāṃ diva ātmānaṃ savitāraṃ bṛhaspatim /
GSP33bbdip11u:5116: iti padasya sapta buddhīndriyāṇi viṣayeṣu jīvena juhotīti saptahotā /
GSP33bbdip11u:5122: sūryarathaṃ prati svātmānaṃ yuñjanti rathe yuktāni bhavantītyarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:5123: saptacchando 'bhimāninā pṛthagvedābhimānī saptacchando nāmā ekaḥ pradhāno 'śvo 'sti /
GSP33bbdip11u:5126: ata eva 'sapta yuñjanti .... eko aśvo vahati saptanāmā';
GSP33bbdip11u:5130: sadā dṛḍham arvaśabditebhyo vājibhyo dūrasthatvādanarvaṃ cakraṃ sūryarathasyāstītyarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:5155: 'samudre antaḥ kavayo vicakṣate marīcīnāṃ padamicchanti vedhasaḥ'; (tai.ā. 3-11-11.)
GSP33bbdip11u:5160: kuto na mantavyamityatastatra hetutvena sūtramupanyasya vyācaṣṭe - antariti //
GSP33bbdip11u:5161: sūtre 'ntarityuddeśyabhāge apekṣitaṃ padamadhyāhṛtya darśayati - śrūyamāṇa iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:5167: tasya dharmāstaddharmāḥ teṣāmupadeśo vacanaṃ ityādirūpaścāsau taddharmopadeśaśca ityāditaddharmopadeśaḥ tasmādityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:5178: upadeśādityantasya sūtrasya tasmādanya eveti na mantavyamityanenānvayaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:5183: jñānakarmākhyadaśendriyeṣu viṣayahotāraṃ tattadviṣayasthāpakaṃ daśendriyāṇi jīvena viṣayeṣu juhvataṃ vā viṣṇum 'anvavindat'; vyajānāt /
GSP33bbdip11u:5188: pramitaruktvanimittāt marīcipadoktānāṃ jīvānāṃ padam āśrayaṃ viṣṇum icchanti prārthayanti /
GSP33bbdip11u:5192: jñānāya marīcīnāṃ padaṃ viṣṇum icchantītyekānvayo vā /
GSP33bbdip11u:5204: kṣīrasamudrasthatvasya viṣṇuliṅgatvaṃ kuta ityata āha - sa hīti /
GSP33bbdip11u:5213: āpo nārā iti proktā āpo vai narasūnavaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:5214: ayanaṃ tasya tāḥ pūrvaṃ tena nārāyaṇaḥ smṛtaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:5218: tathāpi pralayārṇavasthatvasya brahmāṇḍavīryatvasya ca kuto viṣṇudharmatvamityatastayorviṣṇudharmatve pramāṇaṃ vaktuṃ pratijānīte - tasyeti /
GSP33bbdip11u:5225: iti paścātpramāṇopanyāsaḥ śrutāvaṇḍakośaśabdaśravaṇe 'pi pratyayasya svārthikatvāttattyāgenāṇḍakośa ityevānūditam /
GSP33bbdip11u:5247: āpaḥ tasya viṣṇoḥ ayanaṃ 'tena saḥ nārāyaṇaḥ smṛtaḥ';
GSP33bbdip11u:5252: aṇḍaṃ praviṣṭo yo viṣṇuḥ so 'ṇḍaṃ bhittvā prakāśitaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:5265: itaśca brahmāṇḍajanakavīryatvaṃ pralayasthatvaṃ ca tasyaiva jñāyata ityāha - ahamiti /
GSP33bbdip11u:5270: ata eva ṭīkāyāṃ tadaheyamiti vyutkramaḥ kṛtaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:5272: aheyaṃ ratiḥ śaṃ ca mitamasyeti raśmirjīvaḥ tamindayati prerayatīti raśmīt jīvaprerakaṃ,
GSP33bbdip11u:5273: inda preraṇe iti dhātoḥ ayaṃ dakārāntaḥ śabdaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:5274: anukṛtyadhikaraṇe tu - indhī dīptāviti dhātuvyākhyānāt raśmīt bhagavadapekṣayā raśmirūpāṇām alpānāṃ sūryāditejasāṃ prakāśakamiti vyākhyātam,
GSP33bbdip11u:5277: pūrṇaṣaḍguṇaṃ nārāyaṇaṃ tadākhyaṃ brahma teja iti vā /
GSP33bbdip11u:5302_0: evaṃ ca pūrvottarapakṣadvaye anyonyaṃ bādhyabādhakabhāvaśūnye sati tadanyathānupapattyā

GSP33bbdip11u:5546_0: prāṇapadapravṛttinimittasya jīvanāḍihetutvasya ca śarīre sati mukhye jīvanādikaṃ
GSP33bbdip11u:5556: evaṃ prāṇasya vāyutvaṃ ānandamayatvaṃ ca na yuktamityarthaḥ / kuto
GSP33bbdip11u:5557: naivamityāśaṅkāyāṃ tatra hetutayā sūtraṃ vyācaṣṭe - yata iti /

GSP33bbdip11u:5565: tathā ca sāvakāśaśruterniravakāśaliṅgena bādha iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:5566: he viṣṇo 'te'; tava śrīśca lakṣmīśceti dve patnyau staḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:5568: tattvapradīpe tu - aṅkasthitā śrīḥ vakṣasi lakṣmabhūtā lakṣmīrityuktam/

GSP33bbdip11u:5612: anena vakṣyamāṇapūrvapakṣaparyālocanayā jyotiṣo viṣṇvanyatvasādhanamukhenānandamayatvasyānyaniṣṭhatvākṣepādānandamayādhikaraṇenāsyākṣepikī saṅgatiḥ sūcitā bhavati /
GSP33bbdip11u:5613: jyotirviṣayaḥ kimagniruta viṣṇuriti sandehaśca sūcito bhavati /
GSP33bbdip11u:5614: 'vi me'; iti ṛṅmantre vītyupasargāṇāṃ kriyāpadenānvayaḥ / tatra
GSP33bbdip11u:5620: ata eva tattvapradīpe 'spaṣṭatvāya vicaraṇābhidhānāt ityuktam'; ityuktam/
GSP33bbdip11u:5625: tathā ca yato me karṇau jyotiṣo viruddhaṃ patayataḥ patataḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:5628: yathā karṇāderjyotirvidūratvaṃ evaṃ jyotiṣo 'pi karṇādividūratvamityāha - vīdamiti /
GSP33bbdip11u:5631: ā samantāt sthitaṃ jyotistadatyantaṃ karṇādiviruddhaṃ vartate /
GSP33bbdip11u:5632: evaṃ me manaḥ jyotiṣo dūre vicarati atīva taddarśanaviruddhaṃ vartate /
GSP33bbdip11u:5650: tathā ca tajjyotirguhānihitaṃ cāgnireva bhavediti prāptaṃ, kutaḥ?
GSP33bbdip11u:5656: ata eva pūrvapakṣopasaṃhāraṭīkāyāṃ śrutiprakaraṇayorbalavatvāditi prasiddhapadalakṣitāyāḥ śruteḥ prathamamuktiḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:5657: ata eva candrikāyāṃ bhāṣye agnisūktasthatvācceti caśabdaprayogādityuktam /

GSP33bbdip11u:5667: yataḥ pūrvapakṣaḥ prāpto 'taḥ uttaraṃ sūtramāha bhagavānbādarāyaṇa ityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:5669: sūtre tattvityasya anuvṛttiṃ vipariṇāmaṃ cābhipretya pratijñāṃśaṃ vyācaṣṭe - viṣṇureveti /
GSP33bbdip11u:5672: iti hetvaṃśaṃ caraṇaśabdasya vicaraṇārthatvaṃ karṇādīnāmityasya adhyāhāraṃ cābhipretya vyācaṣṭe - karṇādīnāmiti /

GSP33bbdip11u:5694: kutaḥ? atra karṇādīnāmetajjyotiḥ prati sākalyena tadaviṣayīkaraṇarūpaviruddha 'caraṇābhidhānāt';
GSP33bbdip11u:5696: māpayati jñāpayati viṣayāniti vā mīyante viṣayā aneneti vā mātrā indriyagaṇaḥ tayā tatastvaṃ 'paro';
GSP33bbdip11u:5697: dūro 'sīti he viṣṇo anyamahimnaḥ paramantaṃ sīmānaṃ te mahimānaṃ ko 'pi śrotrādinā nāpeti ca prakṛtānuguṇyena śrutirvyākhyeyā /

GSP33bbdip11u:5735: tadeva kuta ityata āha - tathā hīti /
GSP33bbdip11u:5738: dṛśyate jñāyate 'rtho yayeti vyupattyā 'gāyati ca trāyati ca';
GSP33bbdip11u:5754: punaḥ 'atha yadataḥ paro divo jyotirdīpyate viśvataḥ pṛṣṭheṣu sarvataḥ pṛṣṭheṣu anuttameṣūttameṣu lokeṣu /

GSP33bbdip11u:5772: sā ca gāyatrī virṇasamāveśalakṣaṇamantrātmakachanda eva bhavet, na viṣṇuḥ /

GSP33bbdip11u:5775: iti pūrvavākyasthagāyatrīśabdasya viṣṇvanyaparatve tata evottaravākyasthajyotiṣo viṣṇvanyatvāpattyā tata eva agnisūktagatajyotiṣo 'pi tadanyatvameva bhavet /
GSP33bbdip11u:5776: ata evānandamayatvamapi anyasyaiva bhavenna viṣṇoriti pūrvoktākṣepeṇa etadadhikaraṇotthānātpūrveṇāsyākṣepikī saṅgatiḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:5781: tathā tasmāt jyotirapi chanda eveti tasyaiva guhānihitatvamāndamayatvaṃ ceti pūrvapakṣaphalaṃ ca sūcitaṃ bhavati /

GSP33bbdip11u:5801: yo gāyatrīnāmā gāyatrīsaṃsthaḥ strīrūpo hayaśīrṣākhyo bhagavān tadidaṃ prathamaṃ rūpamityāśayena tasya dvitīyaṃ rūpaṃ vaktuṃ gāyatrītyādivākyaṃ pravṛttam /
GSP33bbdip11u:5817: tathā ca jyotiḥśabdena viṣṇureva nigadyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:5818: kuta ityato nigadāditi hetuṃ yojayati - hi nigadyata iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:5826_1: prasiddhasya gāyatrīpadasya viṣṇau prayoge prayojanamatra vadatā sūtrakṛtā pūrvatrottaratra
GSP33bbdip11u:5826_2: cāgnyādipadasya viṣṇau prayoge prayojanaṃ sūcitamiti darśayitum /

GSP33bbdip11u:5835_0: ata eva tattvapradīpe ādiśabdasyobhayatrānvayaṃ prathamādiśabdena tejaḥśabdānāṃ dvitīyena
GSP33bbdip11u:5835_1: chandaśśabdānāṃ ca grahaṇamabhipretya 'agnyāditejaḥśabdānāṃ gāyatryādichandaśśabdānāṃ ca'; ityuktam /
GSP33bbdip11u:5851_1: viṣṇuḥ syāttadeva kuta ityato gānatrāṇakartṛtvaliṅgādityāśayena tasyāsiddhiparihārāya
GSP33bbdip11u:5858: ādipadena 'yā vai sā gāyatrī iyaṃ vāva sā yeyaṃ pṛthivyasyāṃ hīdaṃ sarvaṃ bhūtaṃ pratiṣṭhitametāmeva nātiśīyate'; (chāṃ. 3-12.2.)
GSP33bbdip11u:5865: 'yā'; prasiddhā gāyatrī tannāmā viṣṇuḥ 'sā iyaṃ vai'; iyaṃ khalu /
GSP33bbdip11u:5868: kathaṃ pṛthivī viṣṇurityataḥ tallakṣaṇayogādityāha - asyāṃ hīdamiti /
GSP33bbdip11u:5881_0: nanu gāyatryādiśabdasya anyatra rūḍhatvātkathaṃ liṅgamātreṇa viṣṇutvaniścaya ityato
GSP33bbdip11u:5881_1: gāyatryādiśruteḥ sāvakāśatvāditi bhāvena gāyatryagnipṛthivyādiśabdāḥ na kevalaṃ śrutyuktayogena viṣṇau sāvakāśāḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:5882: api tu paurāṇikarūḍhyā gāyatryāḥ bhagavadadhīnatvādapītyāśayena tatra smṛtimāha - sarveti /
GSP33bbdip11u:5888: kuta ityataḥ chanda ādīnāṃ bhagavadadhīnatvāditi pratyekaṃ hetutrayasūcanāya hiśabdatrayaṃ,
GSP33bbdip11u:5890: chandasāṃ lokānāṃ ca pratyakṣatvāt devānāṃ ca parokṣatvādeṣo 'sāviti vicitroktiḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:5891: kathaṃ tarhyanyatra vyavahāra ityata āha - teṣāmiti /
GSP33bbdip11u:5902: hetvantareṇāpi gāyatryāḥ viṣṇutvaṃ sādhayatsūtramupanyasya tadgṛhītāṃ śrutimudāharati - bhūtādīti/
GSP33bbdip11u:5904: sūtre bhūtaṃ viśvamādiḥ prathamoddiṣṭaṃ yeṣu te bhūtādayaḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:5905: te pādāḥ yasya gāyatrīpadārthasya sa bhūtādipādaḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:5906: tasya vyapadeśaḥ tatpratipādakaṃ vākyaṃ tasyopapatteḥ yuktatvāditi vigrahaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:5913: bhūtādiśabdagṛhītāmṛtākhyāṃśacatuṣṭavattvopadeśāt tasya ca viṣṇāvevopapatteranyatrānupapattereva gāyatrīśabdavācyo viṣṇureva bhavedityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:5914: caśabdasya vyapadeśapadenānvaye gāyatryā viṣṇutve sādhye pūrvasūtre darśanapadoktahetoḥ etatsūtroktahetudvayasya ca samuccaye saḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:5915: yathāśrutānvaye tu bhūtādipādatvasya viṣṇuliṅgatvaṃ na kevalaṃ viṣṇorevopapatteḥ siddham,
GSP33bbdip11u:5916: kintu puruṣasūktoktatvācceti hetusamuccaye sa iti jñeyam /
GSP33bbdip11u:5918_0: iti vākyena yaiṣā ṣaḍvidhā gāyatrī sā catuṣpadetyevaṃ gāyatrīnāmakasya bhagavataḥ
GSP33bbdip11u:5918_2: catuṣpādatvaṃ vidhāya svoktārtha eva puruṣasūktamantraḥ samākhyārūpatvenodāhṛto brāhmaṇena
GSP33bbdip11u:5927: pādo 'sya sarvā bhūtāni tripādasyāmṛtaṃ divi'; (chāṃ. 3-12-6.) iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:5947: tathāpi ṭīkāyāṃ sarvāṇi bhūtānyasyaikaḥ pāda iti pādavidhānadarśanāt;
GSP33bbdip11u:5953: trayāṇāṃ pādānām aṃśānāṃ samudāyo nārāyaṇavāsudevavaikuṇṭhasaṃjñaṃ triṣu rūḍhyā dyotamānatvācca dyuśabdavācyeṣu śvetadvīpānantāsanavaikuṇṭheṣu tiṣṭhatīti ṛcoktamityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:5963: pādaṃ ṣaḍḍhoturna kilā vivitse (tai.ā. 3-11.) iti śruteḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:5964: pāda iti ekadeśaparimitaṃ caturbhāgabala itivadbhinnaṃ ca /
GSP33bbdip11u:5977: tathā ca 'co'; yataḥ śrutisthena pāda iti śabdena na bhūtānāmityamṛtapādatrayavatsvarūpāṃśatvamucyate/
GSP33bbdip11u:5979: kintu, yajñadattasya caturbhāgabalo devadatta iti vadbhinnameva viśvam /
GSP33bbdip11u:5981: viṣṇupādaparimitasāmarthyam ataḥ pāda iti viṣṇupādatvenocyate ityarthaḥ /

GSP33bbdip11u:6035_1: sādhye puruṣasūktoktatvāditi yadanumānaṃ sūcitaṃ tasyāprayojakatvamāśaṅkya pariharati - sa hīti //
GSP33bbdip11u:6039: anyathā bhūtādipādatvasya viṣṇudharmatvābhāve puruṣasūktapratipādyatvaṃ na syāditi bhāvaḥ /

GSP33bbdip11u:6042: catuṣpadetyuktagāyatrīcatuṣpādatvasya puruṣasūktamantreṇopapādanāt tatpratipādyatve tadupapādyagāyatrīśabdārthatāpi tasyaiva prāpnotīti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:6043: puruṣasūktoktasya viṣṇutvaṃ kuta ityata āha - yajñeneti /
GSP33bbdip11u:6050: yajñaśabdaḥ kathaṃ viṣṇutvaniścāyaka ityato vidvadrūḍhyetyāha - yajña iti /

GSP33bbdip11u:6066: na ca tata eva bhūtādipādatvasya viṣṇuliṅgatvaniścayaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:6069: iti śruterbhūtādipāde yajñaśruterabhāvādtyataḥ puruṣasūktoktasya viṣṇutve smṛtiñcāha - tasminniti //
GSP33bbdip11u:6073: tretāyuge sarvaiḥ puruṣanāmabhī rāma evābhidhīyate ityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:6081: yathā kṛtsne pauruṣe sūkte viṣṇureva na tvanyaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:6083: anena siddhasyaiva dṛṣṭāntatvātpuruṣasūktasya viṣṇuparatvaṃ siddhamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:6088: upadeśabhedān neti cen nobhayasminn apy avirodhāt / BBs_1,1.27 /
GSP33bbdip11u:6100: virodhāt na dvayorviṣṇvākhyam ekaṃ vastu pratipādyaṃ,

GSP33bbdip11u:6111: yasmādevaṃ bhinnopadeśadvayamasti tasmādatropadeśadvaye gāyatrījyotiśśabdābhyāṃ naikaṃ vastu viṣṇvākhyamucyate /
GSP33bbdip11u:6123: tathā ca kintūbhayasmin apyupadeśe ekameva viṣṇvākhyaṃ vastūcyate iti yojanā /

GSP33bbdip11u:6128_2: rūpatrayaṃ divitiṣṭhatītyucyate iti na saptamyantopadeśavirodhaḥ / na ca
GSP33bbdip11u:6136: tadendrasadanasya dyutvāt taduccasyāpyuparisthitatvena tatsajātīyasyavaikuṇṭhasya divaḥ paratvam /
GSP33bbdip11u:6138: divīndrasadanaṃ caiva tatpare tu divaḥ pare //
GSP33bbdip11u:6139: iti smṛtermerorapi dyutvāttaduccasya bhūspṛṣṭatvena tatsajātīyasyānantāsanasyāpi divaḥ paratā /
GSP33bbdip11u:6140_0: evaṃ sūryamaṇḍalasyāpi dyutvāttaduccasyoparisthatvena tatsajātīyasya bhūmeḥ kiñcidantaritasya
GSP33bbdip11u:6140_1: sarvargasamonnatasya śvetadvīpasyāpi divaḥ paratvamastīti na pañcamyantopadeśavirodho 'pīti /
GSP33bbdip11u:6141: dyuparatvaṃ ca sambhāvitasajātīyadyuparatvamiti na yāvattvayatkiñcittvamukhena dūṣaṇāvakāśaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:6142: vaikuṇṭhasya svargalokātparatvenaiva divaḥ paratvasiddhāvapi tasya 'sarvataḥ pṛṣṭheṣu';
GSP33bbdip11u:6144: na ca lokatrayavivakṣayaivānantāsanādīnāmapi mervādiparatvena divaḥ paratvasyāpi siddheḥ saptalokavivakṣā vyartheti vācyam /
GSP33bbdip11u:6145: tathā sati vaikuṇṭhasyāpi dyuśabdārthaniviṣṭatvena tasya sarvadyuparatvāsiddhyāpatyā 'dvyātmakebhyaśca sarvebhyo vaikuṇṭhaścocca ucyate';
GSP33bbdip11u:6151: iti pramāṇabalena citprakṛtyātmakānantāsanaśvetadvīpavaikuṇṭhākhyasthānatraye saptamyanto dyuśabdo dyotamānatvanimittena yaugikaḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:6152: svargādau tu rūḍha iti upadeśayoravirodha iti prakārāntareṇa virodhaparihāraḥ kṛtaḥ // 11 //
GSP33bbdip11u:6158: tatra 'tā vā etāḥ śīrṣan chriyaḥ śritāścakṣuḥ śrotraṃ mano vākprāṇaḥ'; (ai.ā. 2-1-4.)
GSP33bbdip11u:6162: atrādhikaraṇe lokato 'nyatra prasiddhaprāṇanāmno viṣṇau samanvayaḥ pratipādyate /
GSP33bbdip11u:6171: tadvai tvamiti vākye uktasya prāṇasya viṣṇutvaṃ na vidyate na yujyate /
GSP33bbdip11u:6175: ityaitareyavākye uktasya śrutasya prāṇasya viṣṇutvaṃ na vidyata iti yojanā /
GSP33bbdip11u:6176: kuto na vidyate ityata āha - indriyaissahābhidhānāditi /
GSP33bbdip11u:6183: 'tā vā etāḥ'; ityetacca caturmukhaśirasi śiraśśabdapravṛttinimittakathanāya pravṛttam /
GSP33bbdip11u:6188: ata eva śrayaṇācchriya iti siddhānte śrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:6192: yataḥ pūrvapakṣaḥ prāptaḥ ata uttaraṃ sūtramāha bhagavān bādarāyaṇa ityarthaḥ / @#----------
GSP33bbdip11u:6202: sūtraṃ paṭhitvā tatrānugamāditi hetvaṃśaṃ śrutyudāharaṇena vyācaṣṭe - prāṇa iti //
GSP33bbdip11u:6221: iti śrutyuktaprāṇo viṣṇuḥ tathaitareyokto 'pi viṣṇureva, na tvanyaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:6229: 'sa eṣo 'suḥ sa eṣa prāṇaḥ sa eṣa bhūtiḥ';
GSP33bbdip11u:6233: tatraiva 'tā vā etāḥ sarvā ṛcaḥ sarve vedāḥ sarve ghoṣā ekaiva vyāhṛtiḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:6234: prāṇa eva prāṇa ṛca ityeva vidyāt';
GSP33bbdip11u:6240: kiñca ye sarve vedāḥ teṣāmapi prāṇa eva pratipādyaḥ/
GSP33bbdip11u:6243: tatra ṛcastu viśeṣata indrādināmavato viṣṇorguṇān alpajñānāmapi prakāśayantīti,
GSP33bbdip11u:6246_0: aitareyabhāṣye tu - prathamaprāṇapadamapi viṣayasaptamyantatayā vyāhṛtiśabdaṃ ca
GSP33bbdip11u:6248: atha devarathaḥ 'tasya vāguddhiḥ śrotre pakṣasī cakṣuṣī yukte manaḥ saṅgṛhītā tadayaṃ prāṇo 'dhitiṣṭhati';
GSP33bbdip11u:6252: tathā ca devasya viṣṇoḥ vāyoḥ adhyātmamadhidaivataṃ ca ratha ucyate ityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:6254: vāgākhyā umā uddhiḥ dhāraṇarajjurūpā adhidaivaṃ viṣṇurathasya prasiddhasyandanasya ca nāgākāromā uddhiḥ 'śrotre';
GSP33bbdip11u:6260: sārathiḥ evam adhidaivaṃ prasiddhasyandanasyāpi rudraḥ sārathiḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:6266: liṅgena pūrvapakṣite kathaṃ tenaiva siddhānta ityāśaṅkānudayāya liṅgabāhulyoktiḥ / @#----------
GSP33bbdip11u:6273: nanu bāhulyena balavataḥ saiddhāntikaliṅgādapi pūrvavādyuktaliṅgameva balavat /
GSP33bbdip11u:6279: iti / ataḥ kathaṃ tairviṣṇutvaniścaya ityato devatopadeśyatvādiliṅgānāṃ niravakāśatvamapi smṛtyā sādhayati
GSP33bbdip11u:6280: - viṣṇumiti / devāḥ viṣṇumeva prādhānyena śiṣyādiṣu jñānasampradāyapravartanena 'ānayan'; upādiśan /
GSP33bbdip11u:6283: tathā ca viṣṇuṃ bhūtiṃ bhūtirjñānādyaiśvaryarūpa ityupāsate ityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:6290: tathā caikaprakāreṇa prabalātpūrvapakṣiliṅgātprakāradvayenāpi prabalasya saiddhāntikaliṅgasyādhikyena nirṇayopapattiriti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:6298: yadā bahutvaniravakāśatvākhyaprakāradvayenāpi durbalaliṅgasyobhayathāprabalaliṅgato bādhasambhavena tainaiva prāṇasya viṣṇutvasiddhiḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:6299: tadā kimu vācyaṃ niravakāśabrahmaśabdābhyāsāditi bhāvenānugamapadaṃ prakārāntareṇa vyācaṣṭe - brahmeti //
GSP33bbdip11u:6309: vāyuryatra sthita urveva garaṇaṃ stavanaṃ cakre tatsthānamudaraṃ tadgatamityarthaḥ / @#----------
GSP33bbdip11u:6312: na vaktur ātmopadeśād iti ced adhyātmasaṃbandhabhūmā hy asmin / BBs_1,1.29 /
GSP33bbdip11u:6321: tathā ca prāṇo viṣṇuriti na yuktam /
GSP33bbdip11u:6323: iti vākyena bṛhatīsahasravakturviśvāmitrasyendreṇa prāṇatayā ātmanaḥ svasyaivopadeśādityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:6327: iti vākyaṃ tu 'tamindra uvāca ṛṣe priyaṃ vai me dhāmopāgāḥ varaṃ te dadāmīti /
GSP33bbdip11u:6334: kimiti? he ṛṣe me priyaṃ dhāmopāgāḥ prāpnuhi /
GSP33bbdip11u:6338: viśvāmitraḥ indrāviṣṭena hariṇā varaṃ te dadānīti punaruktassan uvāca /
GSP33bbdip11u:6339: kimiti? tvāṃ sāmānyataḥ pūrvam ahaṃ jāne /
GSP33bbdip11u:6344_1: sulabhatvāditi tattvanirṇayaṭīkārītyā ahamitīndrāntaḥsthena hariṇā svātmano nirdeśādasmīti
GSP33bbdip11u:6346: ahaṃ prāṇo 'smīti padānāṃ aheyatvaprakṛṣṭānandatvasaṃhartṛtvajñātṛtvanimittaiḥ bhagavati samanvayapakṣe tu na tadanupapattiriti dhyeyam /
GSP33bbdip11u:6352: tathā cetthaṃ tattvapradīpaṭīkoktā yojanā - nāyaṃ prāṇa indraḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:6358: yato 'tra prakaraṇe svasthitasyaiva prathamaṃ 'prāṇo vā ahamasmyṛṣe';
GSP33bbdip11u:6361: yato 'tra tasyaiva prāṇākhyaparamātmanaḥ 'prāṇastvaṃ prāṇaḥ sarvāṇi bhūtāni';
GSP33bbdip11u:6369: athavā - adhikaścāsāvātmā cādhyātmā tasya sambandhaḥ bahuścāsāvadhyātmasambandhaśceti vigrahaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:6373: vidyata ityanantaraṃ tadapekṣayāyam upadeśo na svāpekṣayeti śeṣaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:6379: adhyātmatvenāntaryāmitvena indrādirūpabahudehasambandhaḥ sarvagatatvamuktaṃ vidyate na caitadatra jīvaviśeṣendre vidyate yujyate tasmāditi /
GSP33bbdip11u:6382: iti śruterindrādīnāṃ viṣṇudehatvādaikyavyapadeśaḥ śarīraśarīribhāvanibandhana iti jñāpanāyādhyātmetyuktiḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:6383: anena bṛhatīsahasravakturviśvāmitrasya taṃ pratīndreṇa prāṇatayātmopadeśādayaṃ prāṇo na viṣṇuḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:6384: kintu indra eveti cet - nendro 'yaṃ prāṇaḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:6391: adhiścāsau ātmā ceti dehaḥ paramātmā cocyate /
GSP33bbdip11u:6392: tathā ca yasmādadhyātmano viṣṇorindraviśvāmitrādidehasambandha ukto 'sti tasmāt /
GSP33bbdip11u:6393_0: athavā - hi yasmāt asminnindre adhyātmasambandhabhūmā - adhirīśvare - adhikasyātmanaḥ
GSP33bbdip11u:6393_1: paramātmanaḥ sambandhasyāveśasya bhūmā bāhulyaṃ vidyate tasmādupadeśasya sannihitaparamātmaviṣayatvopapteriti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:6395: hi yasmāt asmin prakaraṇe 'dhyātmasambandhabhūmoktaḥ tasmāditi sūtrārtha ukto bhavati / @#----------
GSP33bbdip11u:6401: nanu yadi prāṇaśabdenendreṇāpi viṣṇureva svātmādisarvagatatayocyate tarhi mayi prāṇa iti nirdeśaḥ syāt /
GSP33bbdip11u:6407: tathā ca yato 'pi prāṇasya viṣṇutve 'pyupadeśaḥ prāṇo vāham ityevaṃrūpo yujyate,
GSP33bbdip11u:6416: yathā vāmadevo nāma ṛṣiḥ antaryāmivivakṣayā 'ahaṃ manurabhavam';
GSP33bbdip11u:6418: tathā ayamapyupadeśo yujyate ata iti sūtrayojanāmabhiprayan sautraśāstrapadaṃ vyācaṣṭe - śāstramiti /
GSP33bbdip11u:6422: yadvā - śāsti prerayati sarvāniti vyutapattyā antaryāmītyetadeva śāstramityasya vyākhyānaṃ bhavatīti
GSP33bbdip11u:6427: tadanusāreṇa ca tattvapradīpe śāsturantaryāmiṇo viṣṇoriti vyākhyānepi nāsya tadvirodhaḥ śaṅkyaḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:6428: yatastatparyāyaśabdavyākhyānenaiva śāstraśabdo vyākhyāto bhavatītyāśayena śāstraśabdaparyāyaśāstṛśabdo vyākhyāyate /
GSP33bbdip11u:6429: yadvā - śāstraśabde śāstṛ a ityavayavavibhāgamabhipretya śāstrityaṃśasyāntaryāmiṇa ityanena aśabdasya viṣṇorityanena ca vyākhyātattvāt,
GSP33bbdip11u:6430: atra tu avayavavibhāgamavivakṣitvā śāstramityakhaṇḍapadasyāntaryāmiti vyākhyānāt tadanukūlatayā 'saṃvicchāstram';
GSP33bbdip11u:6442: svapnaḥ / agrahaḥ jāgratsvapnaviṣayajñānarahitā śayyā suṣuptiḥ nāmarūpakriyāsu śabdārthakarmasu vṛttirvyāvṛttiryanyāḥ sā /
GSP33bbdip11u:6448: paraṃ uttamaṃ padaṃ sadbhiḥ prāpyaṃ brahma aham acintayamiti /
GSP33bbdip11u:6457: nanvantaryāmiṇi ahamādiprayogaḥ kathaṃ sambhavatītyāśaṅkyāṃ tatra tuśabdasūcitāṃ smṛtimevāha - tattaditi/
GSP33bbdip11u:6471: anena harau paramamukhyatā anyatra kevalamukhyatā coktā /
GSP33bbdip11u:6475: tānavivekenājñāḥ kevalajīvādau prayuñjate dahati śabdamiva kāṣṭhe /
GSP33bbdip11u:6476: prājñāstu mukhyāmukhyavivekavanto hyamukhmarthamanādṛtya mukhyārthe harau prayuñjataiti tattvanirṇaṭīkoktamanusandheyam /
GSP33bbdip11u:6477: 'pādme'; ityanantaram 'antaryāmiṇyahamādipadānāṃ mukhyatvokteḥ śāstradṛṣṭyā ahamādyupadeśo yukta eva';
GSP33bbdip11u:6484: nanvantaryāmiṇi ahamādiprayogādarśanāt tadayoga ityāśaṅkāṃ sūtroktadṛṣṭāntavivaraṇena pariharati - ahamiti //
GSP33bbdip11u:6492: jīvamukhyaprāṇaliṅgān neti cen nopāsātraividhyādāśritatvād iha tadyogāt / BBs_1,1.31 /
GSP33bbdip11u:6494: iti jīvaliṅgaṃ prāṇasaṃvādādimukhyaprāṇaliṅgaṃ tasmāt neti cet -
GSP33bbdip11u:6499: saṃvādo vivādaḥ kalahaḥ prāṇasya prāṇaissaha saṃvāda iti vigrahaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:6500: tathā ca yasmādatra prakaraṇe 'taṃ śataṃ varṣāṇyabhyārcat tasmācchataṃ varṣāṇi puruṣāyuṣo bhavanti'; (ai.ā. 2-2-1.)
GSP33bbdip11u:6501: ityanena yacchatasaṃvatsaraparyantaṃ prāṇasya jīvadehe 'vastānahetukaṃ śatāyuṣṭvarūpaṃ jīvaliṅgamuktaṃ tat 'tāvanti śatasaṃvatsarasyāhnāṃ sahasrāṇi bhavanti';
GSP33bbdip11u:6504: iti vākyena prāṇasya prāṇairindriyaiḥ saha saṃvādarūpamukhyaprāṇaliṅgamuktam /
GSP33bbdip11u:6505_0: yasmāccādipadagṛhītaṃ 'prāṇo vaṃśa iti sthaviraḥ śākalyastadyathā śālāvaṃśe sarve
GSP33bbdip11u:6505_1: 'nye vaṃśāḥ samāhitāssyuḥ evamasmin prāṇe cakṣuśśrotraṃ mano vāgindriyāṇi śarīraṃ
GSP33bbdip11u:6506: iti vākyena sarvajīvendriyadehadhārakatvarūpaliṅgaṃ coktamasti tasmādayaṃ prāṇo na viṣṇuḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:6511: tathāpi liṅgasya bahuṣu sthaleṣu anugamo 'stīti jñāpanāyopaniṣado jīvaliṅge tātparyamastīti jñāpayitum anusandhivākyamevodāhṛtam /
GSP33bbdip11u:6512: siddhānte śrutyarthastu - puruṣāyuṣaḥ śatasaṃvatsarasyāhnāṃ sahasrāṇi śatasaṃvatsarāntaḥpraviṣṭāharniyāmakasūryagatabhagavatpuruṣarūpāṇi tāvanti sahasrāṇi /
GSP33bbdip11u:6513: kiyanti? bṛhatīsahasragatākṣarāṇāṃ vācyāni puṃrūpāṇi yāvanti sahasrāṇi tāvanti /
GSP33bbdip11u:6514: tathā ca tāni ṣaṭtriṃśatsahasrāṇi sampannāni bhavanti /
GSP33bbdip11u:6527: na coktajīvamukhyaprāṇaliṅgavirodha ityatastatrahetutvena yataḥ śāstradṛṣṭyā tvayamupadeśaḥ ityasyānuṣaṅgaṃ,
GSP33bbdip11u:6528: kimarthamantaryāmīti praśnasyāntarupāstyarthamiti parihāraṃ cābhipretya na copāsane 'vāntarabhedābhāva iti codyottaratvena pravṛttam 'upāsā';
GSP33bbdip11u:6532: tathā ca dehāntargatatvena tadbahirgatatvena sarvagatatveneti prakāreṇa 'upāsātraividhyāt';
GSP33bbdip11u:6534: nanu tathāpi kathanaṃ vyarthaṃ vastuta upāsanātraividhyasyehānuktasyāntaryāmikathanāprayojakatvādityataḥ pravṛttam 'āśritatvāt';
GSP33bbdip11u:6547: atropāsanātraividhyamucyata ityatrāpi kiṃ liṅgamityata āha - sa iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:6552: anena bhagavato dehāntaḥpraveśokteḥ ukteścopāsanārthatvāt antarupāstiruktā bhavati /
GSP33bbdip11u:6558: tathā ca tatamaṃ atiśayena vyāptaṃ niravadhikavyāptimantaṃ 'brahma'
GSP33bbdip11u:6564: jānannaitareyaḥ itarāyā apatyaṃ pumān viśālasaṃjñāt ṛṣeḥ utpannaḥ aitareyaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:6565: 'mahidāso'; mahino mahātmāno devāḥ dāsabhūtāḥ yasyāsau bhagavānāhetyarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:6567: atra bahirupāstyarthaṃ mahidāsa āheti bahirupāstiruktā bhavati /
GSP33bbdip11u:6576: asyāḥ upaniṣadaḥ aitareyasaṃjñayaivetarāputrasya mahidāsasya ṛṣitvasiddhyā taduktervyarthatvāt / @#----------
GSP33bbdip11u:6583: tathāpi mahidāsasya viṣṇutvaṃ kuto jñāyata ityata āha - mahidāseti //
GSP33bbdip11u:6588: iti chāndogyabhāṣye anantaroktabhagavadanyaḥ tatsaṃjñaketarāputraḥ ṛṣiratra na vivakṣitaḥ, kintu /
GSP33bbdip11u:6597: tadavatārabhūtaḥ pūrvoktaḥ sa evātra vivakṣita ityāha - sākṣāditi/
GSP33bbdip11u:6609_0: tathā ca teṣāṃ puruṣāṇāṃ manuṣyarṣigandharvadevākhyādhikāriṇāṃ teṣu trividhopāsaneṣu
GSP33bbdip11u:6609_1: madhye tattadupāsane yathākramaṃ bahirantarvyāptirūpaikaikopāsana eva yogyatayā yogyatvena hetunetyarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:6611: tathā cānekavidhopāstiyogyatāvatāmadhikāriṇāṃ naikavidhopāsanayā brahmajñānamiti tattraividhyamāvaśyakamiti bhāvaḥ / @#----------
GSP33bbdip11u:6618: puruṣāṇāmuktānekavidhopāsanayogyatā kuto jñāyata ityataḥ kartṛviśeṣānanupādāya sāmānyataḥ upāsakatraividhyapratipādikāṃ smṛtiṃ paṭhati - keṣāñciditi //
GSP33bbdip11u:6626: iti brāhma ityasya tattadupāsanayogyatayā tadviśiṣṭatvena puruṣāṇāmāśritatvāduktatvāditi pūrveṇānvayaḥ / @#----------
GSP33bbdip11u:6653: na cātra “yeṣāṃ bahirupāsanena mokṣasteṣāmapi hṛdyupāsanaṃ kiñcitkāryameva“iti bṛhadbhāṣyeṇa “bhagavān bimbadarśanenainaṃ mocayati“iti nyāyavivaraṇena ca virodhaśśaṅkyaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:6654: agnāviti vākye 'nyaniṣedhābhāvena bimbaśabditasvasvayogyātmāparokṣārthaṃ hṛdyupāsanasyāpi sarvaiḥ kāryatvābhyupagamāt /
GSP33bbdip11u:6655: mocakayogyāparokṣadvārābhūtāvatārādyaparokṣasādhanopāsanāya eva taistaiḥ prācuryeṇa prakaraṇasyāgnāviti vākyena vyavasthayā pratipādanācca /
GSP33bbdip11u:6660: ato na tadyogāditi hetvasiddhiḥ śaṅkyeti bhāva /
GSP33bbdip11u:6679: na caikavidhopāsanayā sarveṣāṃ brahmāparokṣasambhavāt kimupāsātraividhyeneti vācyam /
GSP33bbdip11u:6680: 'tadyogāt'; teṣāṃ puruṣāṇāṃ tasmin tadupāsana eva yogyatvāt /
GSP33bbdip11u:6681: anekavidhopāstiyogyatāvatāṃ ca puruṣāṇāṃ ekavidhapāsanayāparokṣāsambhavena yogyatābhedādupāsātraividhyasyāvaśyakatvāditi sūtrārtha ukto bhavati /
GSP33bbdip11u:6682: na ca vivādakartṛtvaliṅgasyāntaryāmiviṣayatve 'udāsīnau ca tāvāstāṃ keśavaścābjasambhavaḥ';
GSP33bbdip11u:6686: viṣṇurevāyaṃ prāṇaḥ ānandamayaśceti yuktā tajjijñāseti siddham /
GSP33bbdip11u:6697: 1. taduktam īśāvāsyabhāṣyaṭīkāyāṃ - 'brahmādīnām aprāptajñānamutpadyate śriyastu sarvadā vidyata iti vivekaḥ'; iti/
